developer: The Great - West Life Assurance Company
description: Information when you’re on the go from your Benefits Solutions People. Great-West Life’s GroupNet Mobile app lets you take GroupNet for Plan Members with you. Great-West’s GroupNet Mobile lets you: •Submit claims online through Member eClaims – part of our industry-leading GroupNet online services •Access personalized coverage information about benefits, claims and more – quickly and easily, any time •View card information including: member ID, Drug, and Travel Assistance •Locate the nearest approved provider who has access to Provider eClaims, through a built-in GPS mapping tool Please review the full terms and conditions of use provided when you download the application. By selecting Install, you grant consent to Great-West Life for the installation of GroupNet Mobile on your device. In addition, you expressly consent to the installation of all updates to GroupNet Mobile that Great-West Life determines, in its sole discretion that you are eligible to receive, including where such updates are provided by Great-West Life or its agents, subcontractors, affiliates or third-party software providers. You may withdraw your consent to the installation of GroupNet Mobile at any time by uninstalling the software from your device. If you have any questions, please write to the Company at The Great-West Life Assurance Company, 100 Osborne Street North, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R3C 3A5, or go to our website at www.greatwestlife.com.
release_text: - Updates to Travel Assistance Card - Bug Fixes

description: American Recipes are very famous in all parts of world. People from different parts of world stays in United states of America and love to cook and taste some delicious American food. American cookbook style was early originated from European style of cooking. American food recipes are prepared such a way that all will love the the addictive taste which makes us feel like having more and more. American foods like yummy burger have fans all over world. Food network of America have combined taste which all love to have. Our recipe App will really help you in cooking some tasty American recipes. Grilling meats made on barbecue maker (BBQ)are very common in American cookbook. Food recipes of America is very tasty and healthy. There are some very special native American recipes according to the regions they live. The common American recipes that are available and common are yummy burgers like hamburger and hot dog. Hamburgers and Hot dogs are actually German dishes later become popular in US. Pizza's are also very famous among all American recipes. The latest trendy new American cookbook include recipes like meatballs, doughnuts, cupcakes and macaroons. Lobster is an integral part of great American recipes. There are also many other shellfishes. There are special recipes called African American recipes were African and American recipes are combined together. American kitchen contain barbecue maker (BBQ), many oils and fats animals. Best American recipes uses rendered pork fat which will be very tasty for the preparation of bacon's. American recipes have rum and beers as their common alcoholic drinks. In American Kitchen recipes like yummy burgers salted, or smoked pork supplement vegetable diet. French fries is a very common dish from American kitchen recipes just as French fries are popular in different parts of the world. French fries are very tasty and can be included in the category of easy American easy recipes. Like French fries another Famous American food is American pie. There are different varieties of American pie recipes. With our American recipes app all will get have feeling that i can cook easily. All have this question in mind how to cook complicated American recipes. Even though Pizza's are Italian dishes but there are many special pizza recipes and yummy burgers are part of American cookbook. American cake recipes have a great variety. American people really love cake recipes. American cake recipes are very tasty, there are chocolate cakes, strawberry cakes etc. There American Indian recipes which gives combine taste of American recipes and Indian recipes. Soup recipes and salad recipes comes in the group of healthy recipes. This Online cookbook will really help all the starters in cooking. Mexican dishes contain very tasty beef recipes and pork recipes. Among beef recipes steaks are very famous. Dinner recipes and casserole recipes are also include in this app. So Enjoy cooking with American recipes... Happy cooking !!!
release_text: NEW FEATURES --New exciting feature of RELATED RECIPES where we give recipes that you would LOVE to try at the end of each recipes you choose. --New EXPLORE option to get surprise recipes for new cooking experience. --You can add ingredients to the shopping list and share the list to make your cooking easier. -- Now you can share the joy of cooking with your friends by recipe share. Happy cooking :)

description: Japan Trains is the first application for Android in Romaji that allows us to find train routes and schedules in Japan, in the vein of: Hyperdia, Jorudan... If you cannot find desired station, you can use % character as wildcard. For example: AZA%BAN will display AZABU-JUBAN station. SHIN%KOBE will display SHIN-KOBE... Important: Hyperdia has changed stations names, so it is necessary to upgrade. No support will be given unless you upgrade the application to the latest version.

This is an extension to the Tweetings for Twitter app. It allows you to edit your photos before posting to Twitter. This app requires version 2.14.6 or higher of the Tweetings for Twitter app We've included all the features you'd expect: Features: + One-tap auto enhance + Gorgeous photo effects and frames + Fun stickers + Color balance + Crop, rotate, and straighten your photo + Adjust brightness, contrast, color temperature, and saturation + Sharpen and blur + Color temperature ("Warmth") + Tilt Shift blur effects + Draw and add text + Create your own memes + Cosmetic tools: fix redeye, remove blemishes and whiten teeth You must have the Tweetings for Twitter app already installed to make use of this extension
release_text: + Brand New Effects + Updated support for Lollipop

description: Classic strategy board game for two players. The game is also known as Nine Men's Morris. * Play against computer or second player. * Select difficulty * Choose from Nine Men's Morris or Twelve Men's Morris

Hey guys and girls, are you ready for the most extreme crazy driving challenge of the heavy duty truck car transporter? As the name implies, “Car Transporter Trailer 3D Sim”, in this parking simulator game app your duty is to transport expensive racing cars and park them in the parking spot. These trucks are actually like “Switch-n-go” which is detachable truck body. In this simulation parking game app you will have to attach the truck body to the massive trailer that contains police cars with a simple technique. Afterwards, you can move this huge trucker towards its destination. You will be given with some amazing cars or detective police cars pre-loaded in the container trucker; you will move this heavy duty racing car transporter truck to its destination with precision and accuracy. Get your hands on the transport car trucker and be the road king. Dare yourself to become a driver of this heavy duty car transport trailer truck. Watch out! You’re about to drive the huge car transporter truck and it contains the most expensive racing cars; don't let these classy racing cars hit each other. These high value beautiful racing cars does not belong to you, your duty is to transport them safely. Make sure to fulfill your duty and transport these awesome cars to the marked destination within the given time. You need to use the 3d camera and maneuver your big truck through the streets of the city. These car transporter trucks will be very crazy at the turns of the roads. So, be careful while turning these big truck trailer car transporters. Parking games usually are challenging yet simple, but this game can be very crazy because you are not only driving a huge truck trailer but that heavy duty truck also contains expensive cars to transport them to their destination. Car Transporter Trailer 3D Sim Features: • Challenging and outstanding environment. • Select any of the three truckers and rule the world. • Clock is ticking so transport these racing cars on time. • Extreme precision 3D truck simulator. • Great dynamic game play. • Excellent sound effects. • Amazing 3D graphics. • Leader board.

description: The SAP Mobile Documents mobile app for Android lets you securely bring all your personal and business documents and content with you wherever you go. Unlike manual file transfers using shared folders or e-mail, with this app you can quickly and easily access and collaborate on files from your computer and corporate document management systems anywhere, anytime. Key features of SAP Mobile Documents for Android • Securely access your content including documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and videos • Navigate through your folders and documents and view them directly in the app • Sync documents to your Android device for offline access in secure and encrypted storage • Create and edit content in SAP Mobile Documents and make it available on any other device • Communicate and share documents with other users and peers Note: To use the SAP Mobile Documents mobile app for Android with your business data, you need to have an account for SAP Mobile Documents provided by your IT department.

This application allows you to use your CANON iMAGE GATEWAY Online Photo Album from your mobile device. [Features] - Manage your photos and movies with 10GB of personal online storage. - Create albums with your photos and movies, and share them with your family and friends via Email, Facebook and Twitter. - Allow family or friends to add their photos and movies on shared albums and view their comments. - Store images in their original resolution or select a resize option. - Upload photos from your mobile device directly to your Online Photo Album. - Download photos and movies from your Online Photo Album directly to your mobile device. [Compatible platforms] Android OS 2.3.3-2.3.7/4.0/4.1/4.2/4.3/4.4/5.0 [About CANON iMAGE GATEWAY] - CANON iMAGE GATEWAY is an online photo service for Canon digital camera and digital camcorder users. It is possible to use the service by registering with an eligible product. - For more details, please access the site by selecting your country/region from http://www.canon.com/cig/ .

Switches is a puzzle game where your goal is to turn all the switches off. What makes this difficult, is that changing the state of a switch will inverse the switches around it. Currently, this is just an experimental release. The Play button is disabled, as there is no "Story" mode yet. You can currently create your own level and publish them online, as well as view and play others. No score tracking or win counts are active. These will be done in a future release.

Fun and addictive Match-3 game!UP to 245 levels!AMAZING! NOTE:DO READ THE HELP CONTENT BEFORE YOU PLAY THIS GAME. The rules of this game changes a lot.So read the help content is very important to you!Play Happy! A classic hexagon Match-3 game launch on Android Market. How to play: 1.Touch the connected jewels with the same color，match 3 or more to break the blocks. 2.Match 6 or more jewels you will get a lighting.Touch the lighting and move your finger to another jewel,all of the jewels with the same color will blast. 3.Match 5 jewels you will get a star jewel,touch the jewel and all of the jewels nearby will blast. 4.If all blocks are broken before time used up,you win,or else you lose. 5.Now it is 245 levels.Amazing! If you like this game, please rate it and recommend to your friends. Thanks for playing!

Bring life to your phone with beautiful plants and an adorable panda. Watch as fishes and whale swim across your sky garden. A delightful rainbow will appear to kindly remind you that you’ve received a message. Touch Screen features: 1. Tap the pinwheel to have it rotate faster. 2. Tap the fishes to have them swim faster. 3. Tap the ladybug to have it crawl in a different direction. Note: To have the rainbow notification function properly, you’ll need to enable accessibility services. To enable accessibility: Settings->Accessibility->Service->Camellia’s Sky Garden->On Camellia’s sky Garden is completely ads free. Like our apps? Remember to like us on facebook or follow us on twitter. Have problems? Shoot an email to contactus@konamobile.com with your device’s model. We appreciate your feedbacks so we can improve our products to better serve you.

Order a taxi from “A-1 Taxi Inc.” using your Android device – 24 hours a day, 365 days a year! Fast, convenient, and easy to use. Use a map to select your pick-up location, and track the location of your taxi. Receive notification alerts about the status of your booking, and when your taxi arrives. TAXI BOOKING FEATURES: • Request a taxi right now, or select a future date and time for pick-up. • Don’t know your location? – Send the taxi to your current GPS position. • You can also tap a location on a map, or type in a pick-up address. • Save a pick-up address as a favorite, and use it for future bookings. • Select booking options for your taxi (example: VAN taxi, pet-friendly, etc.) • Send additional info the driver – type a message, up to 255 characters. • A confirmation message lets you know your booking request was accepted. • Push notifications alert you when your taxi is on the way, and when it has arrived. TRACKING FEATURES: • Display the current location of your taxi on a map. • Cancel a booking. • Display up to three previous bookings made with your mobile device. • Tap a button to make a phone call to “A-1 Taxi Inc.” (if app is installed on an Android phone). NOTE: If the “Brampton A-1 Taxi” application is installed on an Android tablet device, the feature to call “A-1 Taxi Inc.” is disabled.

Simple and Statistical precision. Support a variety of Android mobile devices. 2G/3G and Wi-Fi network data traffic monitoring capabilities. Network data traffic to warn function. Real time monitoring of network data charts and summary. Paid version：No ads.
release_text: - Fixed Statistical Bug - Fixed Force Close Bug

description: The Voice of Russia, one of the biggest broadcasting companies in the world, is aired in 29 languages, in 225 of the world’s largest cities. We offer you an unbiased and alternative view on the events in Russia and abroad, exclusive interviews and analytical articles, and also reports from all parts of the world. Using the Voice of Russia’s app you will be able to quickly receive fresh news, listen to radio programs, see video clips, photo galleries, and other multimedia products. The VoR app allows users to read the materials posted on the Voice of Russia’s website in the language of your choice and share that material on social networks such as Facebook, Twitter, Google +, and VK. Breaking news from around the world is made available with the help of Push Notification.

This is an easy-to-use navigator for Lisbon metro. No Internet connection required so you can use it on the go. Features: - simple, fast and easy to use - gestures controlled map - stations quick search - optimal route planning - step-by-step route directions (on map or in a detailed list)

Welcome to the Free Kick World Championship! Are you keen on sports and sport games? Then this exciting football game was designed for you! It will make you feel real soccer player on the field. Choose your favorite team and score points for it. Every time you score a goal - the opponent score will be decreased. Just shoot goalwards and kick the ball bringing up the score! FreeKick soccer game gives sporting chance to feel the winner giving a flick to the ball. It’s super easy, but very interesting! Install this free soccer game and enjoy it! - Realistic graphics and nice sound - Global ranking of countries online - Improved physics engine Improve your skills with our Free Kick game and help your favorite team to win the Football World Cup!

Be the soldier of justice and rid the streets of villains. Get ready for battle and choose your toxic weapon. Acid Wars: Soldiers of Justice is here! The war game begins now! There are soldiers of justice to choose from to help you win the battle. This is street wars; the only way to win the battle is to shoot down all the criminals by using your acid gun. These villains are tough to beat so you need acid as your weapon of choice. Justice must be served. Win the war game. Acid Wars: Soldiers of Justice war game is a cool game to play. You will feel like you are in battle with the enemies of the Desert Storm times. Lead your army and win the battle. Be careful with you acid gun, it is one tough weapon of choice. An army of villains is out there to stop you from serving justice. Win the battle at all cost! Rally the soldiers of justice, lead the army to victory and say the phrase “justice is served”! Acid Wars: Soldiers of Justice is easy and fun to play. Win the battle is the goal of the game. You can win the war game by leading your army across the streets of criminals and bringing them all to justice. Your army awaits your orders, lead them to battle and dominate the street wars. Engage your enemies in a war game and show the how justice is given to bad people. Pack up your weapon and lead the way, Soldier. Make sure no villain will get away from the streets of chaos. Jump and run your way across the toxic streets and win the battle. Soldiers of Justice always win. Drive them all away with your toxic weapon and be the bearer of justice. It is time to show these villains who is the soldier of justice!

Sabemos que como mujer tenés muchas cosas en la cabeza, y a veces es difícil acordarte de tomar la pastilla anticonceptiva todos los días. Por eso en URUFARMA creamos una app gratuita para ayudarte. - Con un recordatorio diario que se interrumpe automáticamente cuando se termina el paquete y se reanuda cuando comienza el siguiente. - Con la opción configurable de posponer el recordatorio hasta cancelarlo al tomar la pastilla. Esto es muy práctico cuando no tenés el paquete contigo y tenés que esperar hasta llegar a tu casa. - Con la practicidad de poder configurarla según el tipo de pastilla anticonceptiva que estás tomando (es decir, según cuántas pastillas trae el pack). - Con un historial y un bloc de notas para anotar eventos puntuales relacionados con el período, para uso personal o para compartir con tu ginecólogo. - Con un calendario que indica la fecha de comienzo de los siguientes packs y la del período menstrual, para poder planificar vacaciones y actividades con antelación y comodidad. - Y con sorpresas cada mes, para que disfrutes al máximo de tu vida como mujer. Además, tenés otras funcionalidades muy útiles: - Listado de farmacias. Enterate de cuáles son las farmacias más cercanas a tu ubicación. - Consultas. Podés llenar un formulario que llega por mail o SMS al personal médico de Urufarma, que te contestará a la brevedad. - Recordatorio ginecológico. Anotá las fechas de tus consultas ginecológicas, mamografías, papanicolaou, colposcopía, y otros estudios que puedas tener que realizarte. NOTA: Esta aplicación tiene un uso meramente práctico. Todo lo relacionado con la indicación y el uso del anticonceptivo es de exclusivo resorte médico, ante cualquier duda consultá a tu ginecólogo. Dejamos constancia que la instalación de determinadas aplicaciones en el dispositivo móvil, puede incidir en el correcto funcionamiento de la app. Además te invitamos a visitar infoanticonceptivos.com.uy, la web con toda la información sobre anticoncepción. Encontrá todo lo que necesitás saber sobre los temas más importantes: . Sexualidad . Anticoncepción . Ovulación . Menstruación . Controles y estudios ginecológicos ¡Y mucho más! Help keep your baby safe with the latest product recall notices and safety bulletins. CutieQs: Safety aggregates consumer product recall and safety information from the US Consumer Product Safety Commission. Using CutieQs: Safety can help create a safer home. According to Consumer Reports, child related items accounted for 73% of all recalled items between October 1st, 2009 and September 30th, 2010. Having access to the latest recall information can help parents and caregivers identify recalled products and prevent injuries. How to Use Using CutieQs: Safety is intuitive and easy. The first time that CutieQs: Safety is launched, it downloads the latest recall and safety bulletins from the internet. CutieQs: Safety will automatically connect and update its list of downloaded recall and safety bulletins. Optionally, pressing the menu button and selecting Refresh will cause the application to update immediately. Once started, a list of recent alerts is displayed chronologically by publication date. The title, publication date, and a short description are listed for each alert. To search the list of alerts, enter a search term into the filter box at the top of the screen and click the icon. Clicking on an alert will open the alert details screen. To share an alert with a friend, click the menu key and Send To from the alert details screen. Sharing allows you to send a link to the original bulletin to friend or post the alert to a social networking site like Facebook. Permissions CutieQs: Safety requires two permissions, Full Internet Access and View Network State. Full Internet Access is required to allow CutieQs: Safety to communicate with CutieQs.com and download the latest product safety bulletins. View Network State is required to enable CutieQs: Safety to determine if it is possible to communicate with the internet. CutieQs: Safety is Socialize Enabled.

"Shine Runner would be completely ridiculous if it weren't so amazing." - Kotaku "With high quality games such as these, Android's future in gaming looks bright." - Droid Gamers "What really makes Shine Runner so much fun is the fully-destructive environment. You can literally destroy anything and everything that gets in your path." - Android Police "A high flying, moonshine money making, backwoods bayou bonanza." - Android Guys Throw your flat-bottomed fanboat into high gear and slip and slide through the muddy waters of the backwoods bayou. Smash and crash through a destructible world filled with rickety swamp shacks, fishin’ boats, chicken coops, gators, and more. Pack your cargo hold to the brim with moonshine, tobacky, snake oil and other contraband and then sell ‘em to the highest bidder in a rampagin’ 10-day race for profit and glory. Just make sure you keep an eye out for Smokey–the more notorious you get, the more cops will come gunnin’ for you. From the same team that brought you critically acclaimed jet ski racer Riptide GP™, and the free to play Beach Buggy Blitz™! --------- FEATURES: --------- AMAZING BOAT PHYSICS Power slide through twisting rivers with the most realistic boat physics ever seen on mobile. COMPLETELY DESTRUCTIBLE ENVIRONMENTS Crash through docks stacked high with barrels. Demolish shacks and outhouses. Punt gators and chickens. If you can see it, you can smash it! SMUGGLE YOUR WAY TO RICHES! Buy and sell contraband goods like Moonshine and Tobacky, smuggling them from one colorful locale to the next in a race for maximum profit. GORGEOUS HD VISUALS Explore a colorful southern world filled with high-detail boats, animated characters, beautiful bayou, marsh, and mountain environments, all running at a silky smooth framerate on your smartphone or tablet – or on your HDTV with HDMI out. GAMEPAD SUPPORT In addition to tilt/touch controls, you can play using your Bluetooth/USB gamepad or XPeria Play slide-out controller. GOOGLE PLAY GAME SERVICES Make your name in the Leaderboards, backup and sync your game with Cloud Save, and show off your skills with some of the wackiest, most inventive Achievements around! --------------------- FOR MORE INFORMATION: --------------------- ** Play Shine Runner on a big screen HDTV with MHL technology. Check out www.meetmhl.com for details. ** Join us on Facebook, and be the first to hear about updates, download custom images, and interact with the developers: www.facebook.com/VectorUnit For support or suggestions, please visit: www.vectorunit.com/support If you have questions about Permissions in this game, please see our Privacy Policy at: http://www.vectorunit.com/privacy/

description: Scientific Calculator 3 is an easy to use universal scientific calculator app for smartphones, tablets or other Android touchscreen devices. It evaluates mathematical expressions under consideration of the algebraic convention "brackets before power before point before line calculation". The rounding of results is adjustable between 5 and 15 digits. Available notations are normal notation (NORM), scientific notation (SCI) and engineering notation (ENG). Trigonometric calculations optionally in Degrees (DEG: 1°=PI/180) or Radians (RAD: 1rad=180°/PI). Scientific Calculator 3 provides a large history display, where all inputs and results can be checked easily. This calculation history is kept until explicit deletion. Scientific Calculator 3 respects your privacy: This app does not require any internet access and is free of advertising banners! Functions on main display: * calc operators: + - × ÷ * parentheses: ( ) * square root and power of 2: sqrt x² * permutation: n! (in landscape format only or on tablets) * reciprocal: 1/x * percentage: % * plus minus sign: ± * memory: MR MS M+ * exponent (optional): Exp Scientific functions via "sci" button and on large displays: * power operator: ^ 2^ e^ 10^ * square and cube root: sqrt cbrt * natural logarithm and logarithms of 10: ln lg * constants: pi 2pi e 1/e * trigonometric, inverse trigonometric and hyperbolic functions: sin asin sinh asinh, cos...., tan.... **Notice: Scientific Calculator 3 is based on the Open Source Software Arity-2.1.6 "Arithmetic Engine for Java" (Copyright © 2007-2009 Mihai Preda), which is licensed under the Apache license 2.0.

description: Get the latest images and reports from satellites - Real-time list of earthquakes worldwide with geo-location - Solar images, animations and daily reports - Satellite images of all continents

Clean, minimalist notebook and journal with background sync (via Dropbox) between Android devices (phones, tablets, ...). Supports Markdown for formatting. Choose from six kinds of notebooks (journal, notebook, quote book, reviews and more), multiple fonts and themes. Each kind of notebook is customised for its purpose (for example journal entries are sorted by date, whereas quotes are sorted by attribution). Full screen editing (or as close as Android can do), immersive mode support for Android 4.4. Dropbox NB A (free) Dropbox account is required to use this App (this App is build around the Dropbox Sync functionality). It will not function at all without linking to Dropbox. After linking it will work offline (and sync when you are online). If you have the Dropbox App installed this is very quick, but you can also link via the web (no need to actually have Dropbox installed). Note (for tablet users linking to Dropbox) If you are using a small tablet and the current version of the Dropbox App you may need to hold it in portrait orientation to link (there is a bug in the Dropbox App with landscape mode; I assume it will be fixed soon). Your data You can import data from Write (NB You must backup first from within Write) and create local backups (and restore data from these backups). You can export locally both into JSON format (a single, standard file) or as individual files; so you can do whatever you want with them. There are also individual options to share (to other Apps) or export. Write Write Notebook is the next generation of what CNET call one of the "Best Android notepad apps for students", Write. I am also planning an App for Google Drive. But for a general purpose App which will work with any Android compatible sync/sharing/cloud platform see Write. Unlike Write Notebook, which focuses on Dropbox, this is agnostic about the sharing service(s) (if any). Write also has some extra features such as an extra row of buttons and a spell check for bluetooth keyboard users which will be coming to Write Notebook at some point in the future.
release_text: v 2.0.1 (small bugfix update for some devices) First release for Android Lollipop. Better Markdown support for everyone. Previous versions: New auto-backup feature: every few days it archives your data on Dropbox. (This is in addition to the existing sync with Dropbox.) Bugfixes + small behind the scenes tweaks.

description: Biblia Creștin Ortodoxă în limba română. Conţinutul Bibliei este cel tipărit sub îndrumarea PF Teoctist cu aprobarea Sfântului Sinod. O noua pagina de Ajutor a fost adaugata, care contine instructiuni pentru folosirea semnelor de carte. O alta functionalitate importanta a fost adaugata care permite marirea textului in cadrul Bibliei. Doamne ajuta! tags: biblia crestin ortodoxa romana testament Christian Orthodox Bible in Romanian. Bible content is printed under the guidance of the Holy Synod PF Theoctistus with approval. Contains the Old Testament and the New Testament, completely offline (no Internet required). Starting with version 1.2, were added to bookmarks (bookmarks) in the Bible. Thus, you can add custom bookmarks to facilitate the reading of Holy Scripture. A new Help page was added, which contains instructions for using bookmarks. Another important functionality has been added that allows increasing text in the Bible. God help you! tags: Romanian Orthodox Christian bible testament

description: Photo Frame Widget is an application to decorate a home screen with lots of photo frames inserting your precious pictures. How to add Widget 1. Press space of Home screen for 2~3 secs. 2. Select Widget when shows Popup window or icon menu up. 3. Select Photo Frame Widget on the widget list. And it will put a frame widget into space of home. Feature 1. 1x1, 2x2, 3x3, 4x2, 4x4, 5x5 Size Frame 2. Directly insert image by taking picture. 3. Picture auto change is possible by setting option. 4. Can add effect into a picture. (Grayscale, Sepia, Brightening, Darkening, Sharpening, Smooth etc..) 5. Can make background image with frames. 6. Search images by web and adjust those. 7. Can convert a photo frame to a shortcut icon. (shortcut to : calling phone, sending message, launching an app) 8. Can use a frame image which is made by you or downloaded from web. ( Needed to put images into SDCard , folder path : PhotoFrameData/CustomFrame/ )

description: Onur Air’in Android telefon ve Android tablet uygulamasıyla istediğiniz zaman, istediğiniz yerden Onur Air uçak bileti satın alabilir, uçuş için ihtiyacınız olan tüm online işlemleri kolaylıkla ve hızlıca gerçekleştirebilirsiniz. Onur Air Android uygulamasının sunduğu hizmetler: * Uçak Bileti Satın Alma: - Onur Air’in tüm yurt içi ve yurt dışı uçuşları için en avantajlı fiyatlarla bilet satın alabilirsiniz - Tek ekranda seçtiğiniz uçuşun en uygun fiyatlarını görebilirsiniz - Üye girişi yaparak sadece 3 adımda bilet satın alabilirsiniz - Uçuş yerinizi ve tarihinizi, Facebook ve Twitter üzerinden arkadaşlarınızla paylaşabilirsiniz. * Mobil Check-in: - Uçuşunuz için istediğiniz koltuğu seçebilir ve mobil check-in işleminizi hızlıca ve ücretsiz olarak yapabilirsiniz. * Kalkış-Varış Bilgileri: - Onur Air uçuşlarının kalkış ve varış bilgilerini takip edebilirsiniz * Tarifeler: - Onur Air’in tüm yurt içi ve yurt dışı uçuşlarının gün ve saat bilgilerine ulaşabilirsiniz * İşlemlerim: - İşlemlerinizi üye girişi yaparak gerçekleştirdiyseniz bilet satın alma ve mobil check-in işlemlerinizin detaylarına uygulama üzerinden ulaşabilirsiniz. * Ayarlarım: - Üyelik bilgilerinize ulaşabilir, dilerseniz güncelleme yapabilirsiniz. * Çağrı Merkezi: - Onur Air Çağrı Merkezi’ni tek dokunuşla arayabilirsiniz. * Duyurular: - Onur Air’le ilgili güncel haberleri ve kampanyaları takip edebilirsiniz. Onur Air’i tercih ettiğiniz için teşekkür eder, iyi uçuşlar dileriz. Onur Air whenever you want with your Android phone and Android tablet app, from anywhere can buy air tickets Onur Air flight, all you need to quickly and easily you can perform online transactions. The services offered in honor of the Android app: * Flights Purchase: - Onur Air for all domestic and international flights can purchase tickets at the most advantageous prices - Choose one screen you can see the flight of the most affordable prices - Members by logging in just 3 steps you can buy tickets - Flight of your location and your date, you can share with your friends via Facebook and Twitter. * Mobile Check-in: - You can select the seat you want for your flight and start the mobile check-in you can quickly and free of charge. * Arrival-Departure Information: - Onur Air flights can track the departure and arrival information * Tariffs: - Onur Air all domestic and international flights are available on the day and hour * Operations: - Transactions carried out by the member login if you purchase tickets and check-in process details of mobile applications upon request. * Settings: - Membership is available for your information, if you wish, you can update. * Call Center: - Onur Air Call Center can call with one touch. * Announcements: - Honor Air'l latest news about the campaign, and you can follow. Thank you for choosing the Onur Air, we wish you a pleasant flight.

Based on the international bestselling book You Are Your Own Gym; The Bible of Bodyweight Exercises. Using nothing but your own body, elite Special Operations trainer Mark Lauren has created short, incredibly convenient workouts that simultaneously build strength and endurance while giving you a lasting fat burning boost. This app includes the warm-up, cool-down and Novice Circuit Training videos. The Novice, Intermediate and Advanced video apps can be purchased separately and integrate with this app to provide access to the complete training system on your Android device. This nine workout training system progresses through three stages of difficulty - Novice, Intermediate, and Advanced - with three total-body workouts per level. Making use of systematic changes to intensity and volume, these workouts will keep you challenged at just the right level, helping you to achieve the best body of your life. The videos in this app are downloaded from Google Play when you install the app. No need to stream video over wi-fi when you work out. The app works in portrait or landscape mode so you can orient your device to watch the workout videos in the way that suits you best. Let Mark Lauren teach you how to use the most advanced fitness machine ever created - your own body!
release_text: Thanks to everyone who gave us feedback - please keep telling us what you think. This update fixes the integration issue with the Novice Circuit Training video and updates the links to the Google Play Store.

This version of Wisepilot is available for Sony Mobile customers only! Enjoy the benefits of being able to navigate all over the world! Bring this application on your travels and never lose your way! Wisepilot offers flexible navigation solutions for everyone, whether you are a frequent driver or simply want guidance on a day trip. You can either use just the free basic features or purchase one or more add-ons, creating a navigation app that is tailor-made just for you. To make it even more personal we have made it available in no less than 25 different languages. As an added bonus new users will have access to all available add-ons for free for a limited time of 30 days. OpenStreetMap Wisepilot uses OpenStreetMap data which is continuously improved by its large user community. As the user, you are in control. Incorrect address for a location? Change it! Missing roads? Add them! The maps are updated frequently and as everything is online you will always have access to the latest information available. And since Wisepilot is designed to use very little data traffic there is no need to worry about astronomical roaming costs when abroad (but we still suggest that you monitor your data usage, of course). Premium add-ons To allow you to customize your Wisepilot app the following add-ons are available for purchase in the in-app Shop: • Turn-by-turn navigation, including: * Voice guidance - Reach your destination with detailed instructions * Speed limits - See current speed limits on your route and get alerted if you exceed the limit • Speed cameras - See all speed cameras nearby on the map and get alerted when you approach one while driving • Live traffic - Up-to-date traffic info gives you an overview of any traffic disruptions on your route to help you plan a stress free trip. Traffic impact will be included in the estimated travel time when navigating. • Wcities - Find current and upcoming events near your location Questions, comments, concerns? Pay a visit to our user web portal at http://appello.zendesk.com
release_text: 5.3.1 * Bug fixes 5.3 * Implemented new billing API for Google Play

description: SHOW OFF YOUR NINJA REFLEXES IN FRUIT JUGGLE! "Requires ninja focus and pilot-like hand-eye coordination. juggling long is hard but super fun and intense!" - Paul J. " Wars and war games are not as intense as this! Who would think fruit juggling is such a fun game to test reflexes. Great competition online!" - Stan V. "Very entertaining for our kids. Keeps them entertained and engaged for a long time." - Bernadette P. ~~ FRUIT JUGGLE: A first of its kind game for Android and iOS phones and tablets. With multiple fruits bouncing off wood planks, make sure they land on the boards and NOT in the water! A sharp mind and "ninja reflexes" are required to be a legend, so crack your fingers and get ready to show off your brain in a play-as-long-as-you can-make-it juggle adventure! :::::: CASUAL AND ADDICTIVE :::::: Fruit Juggle is easy to learn and play! When the fruit is in the air, drag it and make sure it lands on the planks. Slowly, more and more fruits are thrown in the mix! Make sure your brain and fingers are fast enough to not drop the fruits. 3 Strikes and you're out! This is not like fruit ninja and not like soccer ball juggling. :::::: COMPETE ONLINE WITH GOOGLE PLAY GAMES :::::: Put your skill to the test on the live stage! Log in with your Google account for live leader boards, achievements, and head-to-head online challenges coming soon! :::::: GREAT FOR EVERYONE! :::::: Kids and adults can compete in the this game, and everyone can build their hand-eye coordination! Got a Nexus phone, Galaxy Tablet, Kindle Fire, you name it: Fruit Juggle works on them all, and looks great with graphics optimized for the latest HD displays! :::::: GRAVY BABY MEDIA :::::: There's nothing we love more than rating and your feedback! We are pleased to offer you free games and hope to make your day better! E-mail us at gravybabymedia@gmail.com or visit us at www.gravy-baby.com!
release_text: Version 1.0.4 [+] Removed AppLovin API and ads [+] Support for all new devices (including Android L) Version 1.0.2 [+] Better Game Saving [+] Improved graphic effects and fruit animations Version 1.0.1: [+] Improved graphics so that fruits pop out more during juggling [+] Touch is better recognized so you can swipe and tap the fruit you want [+] Pause button activated by tap (not swipe anymore) to save you fruit time Version 1.0: [+] Google Play Games integrated by our ninja programmers!

description: Notepad Description: Notepad is the simple, elegant, easy way to keep notes on your phone. Once upon a time, you had to write down notes in a paper notepad and carry it around with you. If you wrote a shopping list or to do list, you might go to the store and discover you had forgotten your notepad. But how often do you forget to bring your mobile phone with you? Introducing Notepad, the notepad you’ll only forget as often as your phone! Notepad is a simple notepad app. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memo, email, message, shopping list and to do list. Notepad makes taking a note easier than any other notepad and memo apps. Keywords: Notes, Notepad, Todo list, list, notebook, write, memo

App for the multiplication tables practice from 2 times table to 9 times table. Ask multiplications at random to examine the knowledge of the tables. If the answer is right, add 3 points and you must click for a new multiplication. If you are wrong, subtract 5 points. Just as if you do not know the answer, and you have to refer to the tables. Also subtract 5 points. It uses voice synthesis to ask and to give the result. If you are wrong, it tells you what was the correct answer. Click in "New Multiplication"button for a new test, write the answer into the text box and click "right?" button to check the result.
release_text: - Now you can choose your language, between spanish or english. - Little error at 4 times table revised. - Button back at 8 times table revised.

description: Приложение является мобильным клиентом для конфигураций «1С:Документооборот КОРП» и «1С:Документооборот ДГУ». Приложение может работать автономно и не требует постоянного подключения к Интернету. Приложение позволяет: • читать входящие письма, полученные в программе «1С:Документооборот 8», • выполнять подготовку и отправку писем, • перемещать письма между папками, • выполнять задачи, назначенные через «1С:Документооборот 8», • выполнять подготовку и выдачу поручений сотрудникам, • просматривать файлы, приложенные к письмам и задачам, • создавать и редактировать записи календаря. • следить за сроками и ходом выполнения работ по контролируемым объектам. В настоящее время мобильное приложение может использоваться с версиями конфигураций «Документооборот КОРП» и «Документооборот государственного учреждения», редакция 1.3, начиная с версии 1.3.2.4, опубликованными на сайте http://users.v8.1c.ru/ . Интерфейс приложения оптимизирован для смартфонов и планшетов. Мы будем благодарны за написанные Вами отзывы и пожелания. Если Вы столкнулись с ошибкой, пожалуйста, пришлите ее описание на v8@1c.ru . The application is a mobile client for the configuration of "1C: Document CORP" and "1C: Document DSU." The application can operate autonomously and does not require a permanent connection to the Internet. The app allows you to: • read incoming emails received in the program "1C: Document 8" • Carry out training and sending letters, • move messages between folders, • carry out the tasks assigned by "1C: Document 8" • Carry out training and giving commissions to employees, • view the files attached to emails and tasks • create and edit calendar entries. • monitor the timing and progress of the work on the controlled object. At present, the mobile application can be used with versions of configurations "Document CORP" and "Workflow state institutions", edition 1.3, starting with version 1.3.2.4, published on the website http://users.v8.1c.ru/ . The application interface is optimized for smartphones and tablets. We are grateful for your written comments and suggestions. If you encounter a bug, please send a description on v8@1c.ru .

This app is for New Jersey Transit rail passengers who are also fans heading to the Meadowlands. Pray the Divine Mercy Chaplet Origin of the Chaplet: Saint Faustina Kowalska was born in 1905 in Glogowiec (Poland). She belonged to the Congregation of the Sisters of Our Lady of Mercy, where she lived thirteen. She also worked in various houses of the Congregation and spent longer periods in Krakow, Plock and Vilnius duties of cook, gardener and porter. His spirituality is based on the mystery of the Divine Mercy, I meditated on the Word of God and looked in their daily life. The knowledge and contemplation of this mystery developed in her a childlike trust attitude toward God and love toward neighbor. Saint Faustina received the confidences of Jesus, who appointed him his secretary and apostle of mercy, through it, to show the world your great post. Sister Faustina's mission consists of three tasks: - Zoom in and proclaim to the world the truth revealed in Scripture about the merciful love of God to each person. - Achieving God's mercy for the whole world and particularly for sinners. - Inspire an apostolic movement of the Divine Mercy, which is to proclaim and attain the mercy of God for the world and strive for Christian perfection, following the footsteps of St. Faustina.

The Preview is the fastest and easiest way to send your Photoshop mockups live to an actual Android device. This makes designing an app's interface much more comfortable. - Easy Setup: Just enable Remote Connections in Photoshop, fill in two fields in the app, and you are ready to go. - Saving Credentials: You don't have to remember your address and password all the time, we store the last connection's details for you. - Live Preview: The Preview will show you your canvas as you edit it. You don't have to save it, press any keys, you got a realtime preview. - Pixel Perfect: If your mockup uses the same resolution as your device's, you will get a lossless, color identical, pixel perfect preview as you design. - All Scenarios: No matter if it's a phone or a tablet, portrait or landscape, we got you covered. Please note: This app requires Adobe Photoshop CS5 12.0.4 or newer to be installed on your Mac/PC. Adobe® and Adobe® Photoshop® are registered trademarks of Adobe Systems Incorporated.

В базе представлены протоколы 2007, 2010, 2012, 2013, 2014 годов. Mobile application DARIGER contains protocols provided officially by the Ministry of Health of the Republic of Kazakhstan. The application must connect to the Internet.

description: Get the real-time status for your Amtrak train trip in a convenient format Find your station easily with our word-completion search. The app also remembers your most recent trip request whose status can be updated with a single button tap. Reverse the route with a single button. The app conveniently retains a list of stations in your most recent queries. Full details are provided on each leg of your trip including scheduled and estimated departure and arrival times. Information is directly from the Amtrak, but there is no affiliation between this app and Amtrak. All Amtrak stations in North America are included along with Amtrak's algorithm for determining the connections and times. To see the real-time departure screens in New York Penn Station and the Amtrak stops in New Jersey, purchase the NJ Transit Departures app. Real-time departure screens for Amtrak trains in the Hudson valley or along the Connecticut shore can been seen by purchasing the Metro North Departures app.

description: Who needs smart actions when you have a setting wizard? Setting Wizard gives you complete control over common Android settings by allowing you to create profiles that automatically change your settings when certain conditions are met. Here are just a few examples of what Setting Wizard can do: * Keep your phone on vibrate unless it is plugged into a charger * Set your screen to maximum brightness when you arrive at the park * Improve your battery life by automatically turning off power draining features such as Wi-Fi when the battery is low * Disable notification sounds when you go to sleep and automatically re-enable them in the morning Setting Wizard has a simple interface that makes it easy to create the profiles you want. Integration with Google Maps makes it easy to define conditions based on the locations you specify, and location update customizations ensure that your battery life is maintained. A simple home screen widget allows you immediately activate or deactivate any profile you create. Profiles can change the following settings: * Ringer mode (normal, silent, vibrate) * Alarm, touch-tone, media, notification, ringtone, system, and call volume * Ringer and notification vibrate * Default phone, notification, and alarm ringtone * Wi-Fi and Bluetooth * Screen timeout and brightness * Auto-rotate screen * Speaker * Airplane mode (for Android versions below 4.0) * Auto-sync Profiles can automatically activate or deactivate based on the following conditions: * Power plugged * Battery level * Wired headset plugged * Location * Time and day * Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connection * Call state and call contact * Screen on or off * Car dock Profiles can also modify or be conditioned on the state of other profiles, allowing an endless number of configuration options. Your phone works like magic with Setting Wizard. Setting Wizard Lite has a 3 profile limit.
release_text: Fixed notification bar icon for Android 4.3 and later

description: If you are a fan of games like Sudoku but you are sick of numbers, Elemental is your game! Use your brain to create elements by mixing earth, air, fire and water to solve puzzles. Complete puzzles as fast as you can and win the high score. You can use tips that teach you how to mix the elements. Each tip contains a famous quote that you can tweet and share with your friends. If you’re still stuck, you can also place a spell that magically puts a piece on the board right where it belongs! Sounds easy, right? Not so fast...the more tips and spells you use, the less points you will earn! You can also connect to OpenFeint and check your scores and ranking against players from all around the world. You can also unlock clever achievements as your skills improve. Elemental is a free app for smartphones and tablets. The game is perfect for mobile phones like Samsung Galaxy S2, Samsung Europa, Samsung Galaxy S, Samsung Galaxy Ace, HTC Desire, HTC Evo, Motorola Defy, LG Optimus One and many others. Available in English, Spanish and Portuguese. Visit our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/vostuelemental *** UNDERSTAND THE PERMISSIONS REQUESTED BY THE GAME *** COARSE (NETWORK-BASED) LOCATION – We use this information to feed our analytics tools and determine which areas have more players. So we can improve the game for different audiences. FULL INTERNET ACCESS – Used for sending analytics data, error reports and also to access OpenFeint. But is not required be connected to the internet to play. READ SENSITIVE LOG DATA – We use this permission to read the log of the device and determine which was the link used to download the game. So we can identify the most efficient distribution channels. MODIFY/DELETE USB STORAGE CONTENTS MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS – This allows you to store Elemental on your SD card!

description: Are you looking for the simple health tips you can use in your daily life? This is the best collection of good health tips for women and men, easy health and wellness tips you can do at home to improve universal fitness and help extend the quality of your life. With or without health insurance, your priority should be health care for you, your family and kids health. Inside this app you will find heart health tips, mental health tips, and general health to improve your body, mind, eyes, and even your hair. These are tricks you can use to stay healthy during the holiday season through summer and spring. You owe it to yourself to learn a new health tip that will help keep you alive to see all the beauty this world has to offer.

description: ** Also look for our apps on Windows, Mac, and iOS devices! ** Quickly catalog, filter, sort, and manage all of the Playmobil sets you own. View information, cover, and add personal details. Boxed sets, open sets, number of pieces, and more! Uses barcode scanning, database search and manual barcode entry. Here are just a handful of the features you get with this app: - Create a free account and store your Playmobil sets collection list in the cloud online. Access from any device any time! - Create a Wishlist of existing and new Playmobil sets that you'd like to eventually own. - Filter an Sort on any field of information within a Playmobil set. - A coverflow view to see all of your Playmobil sets when you turn your device sideways. - Sort with the words The and A in the title. - Library or List views. View your collection as you'd see it on a wall. - Add your person details to a Playmobil set: Loaned To, Purchase Price, Storage Location, etc. - Edit any Playmobil set details that are incorrect. All of our data is user driven so correct it as need and it will fix it for everyone! - Support for all countries, sets, catalog numbers, etc. - High resolution cover art for each Playmobil set. - Bulk Scanning to add your Playmobil sets to the application even quicker. - Shake to select a random item in your collection. - Offline viewing of collection, export your collection, extra themes, and more coming soon! Check out other apps by Sort It! Apps to manage most any collection you own.
release_text: Version 2.0: - Changed to a new barcode scanner to see if it fixes some crashing when scanning - New scanner also prevents annoying double and triple scans - Added Filtering - Added reverse Sorting - Added right-side Index - Added a new lookup system for items that are not yet in our database - Fixed many bugs and crashes

This Gothic theme features glowing red framed dark black buttons on a bright flame filled background. Fire up your phone with this hellish Fire Skull Theme! Matching Theme GO Locker - http://bit.ly/lockskull This is not a standalone app, you need to have GO Keyboard installed in order to use this theme. The theme is high-definition and can be used on tablets too. We used ads to make possible this free premium app. HOW TO APPLY THE THEME: Download the theme. Press the "Open" button. Press "Apply Theme" button. HOW TO APPLY THE CUSTOM FONT: Press long "?123" key from the keyboard. Press "Advanced settings". Press "Font Settings". Press "Scan fonts". Press "Select font" (now choose the font that has GO Keyboard Fire Skull Theme on it). CONTACT US: If you encounter any problems or have any questions contact us at app.skins@gmail.com . Rate this app and let us know your thoughts about it so we may improve.

Epic adventure awaits as you battle enemies, collect, fuse, and summon unique creatures and dragons, and become a coin dropping master! - - - - - Privacy Policy: http://www.sega.com/mprivacy Terms of Use: http://www.sega.com/terms SEGA, the SEGA logo and DRAGON COINS are either registered trade marks or trade marks of SEGA Holdings Co., Ltd. or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
release_text: Thanks for playing Dragon Coins! This update includes: *Hundreds of new monsters - watch for them in upcoming Summon chests! *Arena Updates: An exclusive background The Clear button on the Arena Team menu will now clear just the current round. Fixes to some Arena Skills Fixed a bug where evolving a monster removed it from your Arena team. Fixed several bugs that could cause the Arena tutorial to freeze. *Other bug fixes and UI improvements.

description: Talk To Search Google makes searching on Google's search engine a breeze. No more typing your search phrases. With this app, you simply just speak your search phrase and you will presented with your search results. Talk To Search Google has no affiliation with Google, Inc

***Fun Fun Games presents... Baby Loves Candy - Sweet Tooth**** Story Candy, Candy, Candy!! Baby Loves all kinds of Candy, colorful Candy, Hard Candy, Soft Candy, Chewy Candy, you name it Baby will eat it, EXCEPT the yucky Coconut and Liquorish Candy Baby HATES them, just the thought of it makes Baby want to cry, so take care not to feed any to Baby. **How to Play** Slice open the balls that pop up on screen with your finger, this will free the Candy from inside. Baby has sat himself upon a skateboard so he can move more quickly, tilt the device from side to side to move Baby so he can catch the tasty falling candy. Keep Baby Full and Avoid the Coconut and Liquorish Candy and Baby will be happy, sounds easy? Well, just try it for yourself! Baby Loves Candy - Sweet Tooth is a cute, addicting and fun, rush arcade game that is free to play and suitable for all ages to enjoy Baby is so cute you will want to play with him for hours!

The Moto 360 does not have a magnetometer. The compass has problems finding North. Support for the Moto 360 is limited This is a compass for your Android Wear with a unique Pointer mode. Feel when you are heading in the right direction. The compass has two modes: Normal: use it as you would use any compass app. Pointer mode: stretch your arm and point. The watch will start buzzing when you are pointing to the set bearing. Switch between the modes by swiping the screen (left is normal, right is pointer mode) Tap the screen to say your bearing: "Bearing north west", "Bearing 38 degrees". On the phone you can set your bearing by placing a marker on your desired location. The bearing is adjusted during your travels.
release_text: - Toggle the map between terrain, satellite and normal. - Distance to way point on the wear compass - Testing for compatible hardware. Some watches do not have a magneto sensor (Moto 360). A compass will never work on such devices.

description: 【ご遊技時のご注意】 スマートフォン端末の「USBデバッグ」が「ON」の状態に設定されている場合、本アプリは起動いたしません。 設定⇒アプリケーション⇒開発を選択、あるいは設定⇒開発者向けオプションより、USBデバッグの項目のチェックを外していただけますよう、お願いを申し上げます。(機種によってUSBデバッグまでの遷移は異なります。) 【機種概要】 ＜初代パチスロ北斗の拳完全継承!!＞ 伝説の始まり 「初代北斗」完全継承！ 初代「パチスロ北斗の拳」のゲーム性を再現！ ■モード移行方式による期待感 ■「北斗カウンター」搭載で前兆32Gの興奮 ■激アツのバトルボーナス それらの遺伝子を完全継承！ ＜ゲームフロー＞ 【通常モード】 各ステージが滞在モードを示唆!? モード移行の鍵を握るのはチャンス小役!! --------------------------------------------------- 【第3のボーナス】 進化した第3のボーナス!『死合』はさらに熱く、激しく!! 『死合の刻』、『天授の儀』という2種類のARTを搭載し、第3のボーナスがさらに進化 『天授の儀』は上乗せ期待度が大幅にアップする爆アツのスペシャルART!! --------------------------------------------------- 【ビッグボーナス】 「玉玲BB」（白7図柄）の平均獲得枚数は300枚!? ラスト10Gのバトルに勝利すれば…!? 「蒼天BB」（蒼天の拳図柄）の平均獲得枚数は300枚!? 蒼天BB終了後は、スペシャルART『天授の儀』へ突入!? 「死合の刻」「天授の儀」突入に期待せよ!! ▼[モバ７]とは [モバ７]はMobage（モバゲー）内で唯一のパチンコ・パチスロ総合ポータルサービスです。 オンライン仮想ホールでのパチンコ・パチスロ実機シミュレーションアプリの遊技を、スマートフォンでいつでも手軽に楽しむことができます。 新規アプリの追加やイベント等を随時実施しており、全国のパチンコ・パチスロファンに親しまれています。 ※本アプリを利用するためには、Mobage（モバゲー）への会員登録およびログインが必要となります。 ※本アプリを起動するためには、別途[モバ７]アプリのダウンロードが必要となります。 ▼ジャンル カジノ ▼サービス提供者 株式会社ディー・エヌ・エー 株式会社バタフライ ▼対応機種 AndroidOS2.3以上、搭載RAM1024MB以上 ※下記機種については、現在非対応機種のため、着席いただくことが出来ません。ご了承ください。 101DL F-08E F-12D SH-05E SH-06D SH-09D 102SH P-07D ▼お問い合わせ お問い合わせの際は［モバ7］アプリトップの「FAQ」をご確認いただき、「FAQ」内の「ご意見/お問い合わせ」からお問い合わせください。 (C)原哲夫・武論尊/NSP 2001, 版権許諾証PGY-703 (C)Sammy

Retrouvez le meilleur du snowboard avec le magazine Snowsurf en édition numérique pour tablettes et smartphones. Vivez une nouvelle expérience de lecture avec des contenus additionnels exclusifs préparés par la rédaction (suppléments photos, vidéos, liens Internet). Find the best snowboarding with Snowsurf magazine digital publishing for tablets and smartphones. Experience a new reading experience with exclusive additional content prepared by the editor (supplements photos, videos, web links).

description: - IT WORKS ONLY ON LG G3 - It Requires Root Access - It Requires Xposed Framework PLEASE Report any bugs here: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2792242 Some Features: description: Ottawa Transit previously known as "My OC Transpo" is a unique transportation App that helps you find your way around Ottawa and the Valley. The App received recognition for the 'Getting Around' category at the Apps4Ottawa contest that ran in February 2011. The many features in this App helps tourists and daily commuters find bus stops, obtain accurate and real-time route arrival times. It utilizes GPS, and GTFS data provided by OC Transpo. *** 2011 Apps4Ottawa contest winner *** http://ottawa.ca/en/mobile-apps-and-open-data/2010-apps4ottawa-contest-winners *** Become a BETA Tester *** To test drive the latest update before everyone else, opt-in to get the update from Google Play using this link Step 1: Join this Google+ Community, http://plus.google.com/communities/101048204336238547253 Step 2: Go to this link to become a TESTER, http://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.alywa.oc.transpo *** *** Near me ✓ Discover near-by bus stops ✓ Find a specific bus stop using search Favourites ✓ Easily access your list of saved buses, stops, trips, and routes History ✓ Display a history of your most accessed routes Stop # Lookup ✓ Display a list of all routes that passes through a specific bus stop ✓ Display up to 3 trips using GPS real-time data ✓ Display scheduled/estimated arrival times ✓ Find stops using stop/station name or number Route # Lookup ✓ Display scheduled route arrival times ✓ Display future schedules by specifying the date Quick Planer / Advanced Planner ✓ Enter your desired origin/destination and let the app plan your trip ✓ Use your current location, or select a desired landmark ✓ Select origin/destination from list of pre-populated values Live Updates ✓ Display the latest news from the Official OC Transpo website Contact OC ✓ Easily access common and useful OC Transpo contact numbers Settings ✓ Easily configure display options ✓ Change start-up screen ✓ Clear your history Widget (Small & Large) ✓ Place a widget on your home-screen Data sources used: ✓ GTFS Data Exchange ✓ OC Transpo Live Next Bus Arrival Data Feed ✓ OC Transpo official web site
release_text: v4.5.2.3e (BETA) ✓ Fixed intermittent API access for devices running Gingerbread ✓ Re-Added "Check" mark icon to toolbar (Route #, and Stop # lookup screens) ✓ Fixed infinite looping issue on the Route # screen

description: FunEasyLearn is the easy and fun new way to learn Portuguese - whether you like listening music from other countries, travelling abroad, working for an international company, or chatting with foreign friends. Our app encourages your kids to learn speaking Portuguese quickly. Get the FREE vocabulary app right now! Learn * 6,000 words with images to illustrate words, phonetic transcriptions and pronunciation recordings by native speakers. * Vocabulary covers 15 thematic topics divided into 140 subtopics. * The entire vocabulary has been translated into 51 languages: ✔ English ✔ Afrikaans ✔ Albanian ✔ Arabic ✔ Azerbaijani ✔ Bengali ✔ Bulgarian ✔ Catalan ✔ Chinese (Simplified) ✔ Chinese (Traditional) ✔ Croatian ✔ Czech ✔ Danish ✔ Dutch ✔ Estonian ✔ Filipino ✔ Finnish ✔ French ✔ Georgian ✔ German ✔ Greek ✔ Hebrew ✔ Hindi ✔ Hungarian ✔ Icelandic ✔ Indonesian ✔ Italian ✔ Japanese ✔ Korean ✔ Latvian ✔ Lithuanian ✔ Macedonian ✔ Malay ✔ Norwegian ✔ Persian ✔ Polish ✔Brazilian Portuguese ✔ Romanian ✔ Russian ✔ Serbian ✔ Slovak ✔ Slovenian ✔ Spanish ✔ Swahili ✔ Swedish ✔ Thai ✔ Turkish ✔ Ukrainian ✔ Urdu ✔ Vietnamese Fun * Select from 7 fun games to learn in a uniquely entertaining manner. * Built-in "Spin Categories" feature allows the app to choose a random topic, subtopic and game for you to enhance your learning experience. * "Review Manager" allows you to review all the words you've learned during each game. Easy * No internet connection is required to use the app. * 3 difficulty levels: beginner, intermediate and advanced. * Choose your preferred tuition language from 51 pre-programmed interface languages: Portuguese, English, German, French, Turkish, Russian, Korean, Arabic, Thai, Japanese, Italian, Spanish, etc. Learn Portuguese app is absolutely FREE! ------------------- About FunEasyLearn.com: With funeasylearn.com learning apps, you can learn Portuguese for free. Learn more than 6,000 words through image illustration, recorded pronunciation and native translation into 51 languages: Portuguese, English, Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Bulgarian, Catalan, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, Georgian, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese. The app's vocabulary is divided thematically and covers most aspects of the everyday world, from the restaurant to the hotel, the home to the workplace, outer space to the animal kingdom. FunEasyLearn is a valuable learning tool as it has many fun games developed by experts. FunEasyLearn is perfect for anyone who wants to learn Portuguese, English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, etc. Please support us by leaving a good rating, or share this app with your friends on Facebook, Twitter or Google+ if you like it. If you have any issues regarding this app, please feel free to let us know at support@funeasylearn.com ------------------- VISIT US: http://www.funeasylearn.com LIKE US: https://www.facebook.com/FunEasyLearn FOLLOW US: https://twitter.com/funeasylearn CIRCLE US: https://plus.google.com/+Funeasylearn

description: Control all your volumes from one easy accessible location. - Adjust Ringer Volume, Media, Alarm, Notification, In-Call, System Volume - Set your device on vibe, mute, normal, or even attempt to boost your volume. - Synchronized with device volume buttons.

Slippery Maze is puzzle game which includes portals, one way door, breakable walls. There is 60 challenging levels now and we're keep developing new levels. Swipe your finger to move,left,right,up and down to reach exit. You can't stop before hit somewhere.

Get the latest FLW news and video, watch live tournament coverage, and find up to date tournament fishing schedules, results, and standings. You can also watch episodes of the FLW TV show, manage your fantasy fishing team, and find stats and personal info on your favorite professional anglers. Features: - Live video and weigh-in data for FLW fishing tournaments* - On-the-water coverage for FLW Tour events* - Latest FLW news and video coverage - Bass fishing tips and videos from pro anglers - Register for FLW bass fishing tournaments - Manage your FLW Fantasy Fishing team and see your league and overall standings - Access to the in-app FLW Digital Bass Fishing Magazine for FLW members and app users with the FLW Live Premium pass* Note: Magazine is best viewed on large devices - especially tablets with a display over 7". *Premium feature Stay connected to FLW while enjoying the outdoors.
release_text: Fixed issues related to Article listing page

description: Slickdeals makes shopping easy by aggregating the hottest daily deals from all over the web. Slickdeals is your one stop shop for the best deals, coupons, sales, promo codes, rebates, and freebies. With tons of categories and products like Electronics, TVs, Laptops, Phones, Games, Clothes, Groceries, and even Local deals for travel, restaurant deals, massages and more from your favorites like Groupon, Living Social and more you’ll save big with coupons, discounts and rebates. Slickdeals is powered by our huge community and forum of users helping each other to save money when shopping online by finding deals across the entire web and sharing them with each other. Discover great deals from all major retailers and get amazing discounts and coupons for stores like Amazon, Best Buy, Walmart, Kohls, JCPenney and more! Features Include: ✔ Push Notifications for Frontpage Deals: Receive a notification when the hottest community-vetted deals hit the Slickdeals Front Page. Be the first to get big savings on shopping deals. ✔ Push Notifications for Deal Alerts: Receive a notification when a deal matches your keywords! Save money on shopping and don't miss out on another Slick Deal! ✔ Frontpage Deals: The best deals every day, vetted by our community and hand-picked by our seasoned team of deal editors with information on Price History, Product Reviews, Coupon Codes, Rebates, Promo Codes, Free Shipping and more! ✔ Local Deals: Aggregated local deals for restaurants, shopping, and services from daily deal sites like Groupon and LivingSocial. “Map View” shows you deals relative to your current location. ✔ Popular Deals: These are deals, coupons, promo codes, discounts from our forums that are popular by community votes and activities, great deals all the time from your fellow Slickdeals community members! ✔ Forums: The heart of the Slickdeals community is in our forums, where users help each other find the best deals, prices, product reviews, savings and feedback. There's no limit to the types of deals you can find here - from freebies to financial discussion, HDTVs to Purses, our users find the best deals on the web, anywhere, anytime. ✔ Categories: Browse deals by category including Apparel, Automotive, Bags & Backpacks, Books & Magazines, Kids & Children, Computers & Laptops, Electronics, Flowers & Gifts, Food & Grocery, Games, Health & Beauty, Home & Home Improvement, Jewelry & Watches, Office & School Supplies, Pets, Sports & Outdoors, Travel and More! Save money on things you already buy. ✔ Vote, Comment, Post Deals: Login to your Slickdeals account and be part of the community straight from your Android device. If you find a deal that’s Slickdeals-worthy, go to the Hot Deals forum and submit a new thread from wherever you may be! Your voting and feedback helps make the community better - thats how everyone helps each other to save money and find the best deals. ✔ Remind me later: We know that buying on your phone can be a pain sometimes, so this feature lets you "save" a deal, and we'll remind you later by email or on the Slickdeals.net website so that you can complete your transaction on your computer or tablet. Save a promo code, coupon or freebie for later. A Slickdeals account is required to use the app. Create an account with your email, Facebook, or Google account for FREE. The free account allows us to properly deliver notifications and enable all the features such as alerts and reminders. Have an issue with the app? Suggestions? Praises? Coupons? Send us an email at android@slickdeals.net - Your feedback will help us make this the best deals app on the web.
release_text: v1.7.0 - Removed the network error messages many of you reported - thanks! - minor bug fixes - We are working hard on an app redesign, coming soon. Stay tuned and until then may your deals be slick! v1.6.9 - hot fix for vote tracking error v1.6.8 - minor bug fixes v1.6.6 - Removed request for 'App and Device History' permissions we don't need or use - (sorry Slickdealers for the mistake)! - An additional release is forthcoming; we wanted to get these out to you ASAP!

description: Welcome to Fairy Party that drives you into the fantasy space where magical creatures enjoy their lives and share their happiness with all the guests. A real festival of fairy tales unfolds directly before your eyes! You can almost hear jingly sounds of magic instruments filling the air and fairies’ songs caressing the ear and protecting from evil spirits. Enchanted sceneries can’t leave you indifferent with twinkling colored sparkles all around pouring mysterious light. This atmospheric interactive live wallpaper is perfect both for phones and tablets, for children and grown-ups. Touch any fay to let her fly faster! Double tap anywhere on your home screen to open settings where you can adjust the fairy party space and mood. You can choose from 5 free themes, tune the speed of fairies' flight and number of fireflies. Be happy, enchanted and enjoying!
release_text: Added one more free background landscape (now there are 5 in total, all are free)

description: ◆ 대한민국 가장 인기있는 애니메이션 "라바" 가 드디어 모바일에서 여러분을 만납니다. (라바 공식 모바일 앱) ◆ 고객 감사 이벤트 하나 - 유쾌한 슬랩스틱 코미디 라바 2편과 재미있는 인터렉션 게임을 무료로 드립니다. ◆ 고객 감사 이벤트 둘 - 26편 전편구매시19.99-->9.99 50% 파격 할인!!! ◆ 옐로우와 레드. 두 애벌레의 상상초월 우주 최강 코믹쇼!! 라바는 버럭 레드와 만능재주꾼 옐로우가 펼치는 유쾌한 슬랩스틱 코미디입니다. 오로지 웃길 수만 있다면 그 어떤 시련과 역경에도 스스로 뛰어들어 웃음을 선사하고 마는 옐로우와 레드. 웃고싶을 때에도, 울고싶을 때에도, 언제든지 엔돌핀 제조기 옐로우와 레드를 찾아주세요! 여러분의 웃음폭탄 라바가 오늘도 빵! 터트려 드립니다. 52번가 횡단보도 앞 하수구 밑에 사는 작은 벌레, 레드와 옐로우. 오늘도 하수구 위에서는 사람들이 끊임없이 하수구 아래로 무엇인가를 떨어뜨립니다. 씹다 버린 껌, 먹다 버린 아이스크림, 동전, 반지 등등. 레드와 옐로우는 이런 것들로 인해 곤란해지기도 하고, 행복해지기도 하며, 때론 떨어진 물건을 차지하기 위해 티격태격하기도 합니다. 또, 인간들에게 별거 아닌 비나 더위, 모기, 바람 등으로 인해 레드와 옐로우는 생각지도 못한 위기 상황에 빠지기도 하는데……어려운 상황 속에서도 우리에게 웃음을 주는 레드와 옐로우. 오늘은 그들에게 무슨 일이 벌어질까요? ◆ 유니버셜앱 : 해당앱은 한번 구매로 안드로이드 폰과 패드 모두에서 사용할 수 있는 유니버셜앱 입니다. ◆ 앱 관련 문의 : 결재 오류 및 앱에 관련된 문제 발생시( helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr ) ◆◆ 블루핀 공지 사항 ◆◆ 안녕하세요. 블루핀 매니져 입니다. 항상 저희 어플에 관심을 가져주셔서 감사드립니다. 어플 사용과 관련한 문의 사항을 리뷰에 올리시면 앱스토어 시스템상 대응하기 어려운점이 있습니다. 이에 고객님들의 문의 사항을 최대한 신속하게 처리하기 위해 블루핀 고객센터를 개설 하였습니다. 앱 관련 문의 사항이나 불편 사항에 대해서는 ( helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr )로 문의 주시면 최대한 빨리 확인하여 답변 드리도록 하겠습니다. 고객센터로 문의시에는 다음과 같은 방법으로 문의 주시면 더욱 빠른 답변이 가능합니다. description: Hide Files & Folders is a free utility to hide files and folders. NO RESTRICTION. HIDE AS MANY FILES \ FOLDERS \ IMAGES \ VIDEOS AS YOU WANT. You can not only hide your secret files and folders but also protect them with a password. Just browse files and folders and add them to this app to hide. Features: 1.Browse and Hide: Just browse and select files\folders to hide. 2.Password Protection:Enable password protection in the Settings screen. Set password to protect them from unauthorized access. 3.Easy Restore:The currently hidden files\folders are listed in HIDDEN FILES tab. Just select single or multiple files\folders from the list and click 'RESTORE' button to restore. 4.Restored File History:After a file is restored, it is listed in the RESTORED FILES tab. You can just hide the restored file with click of a button from this tab without browsing the same again. 5.You can also delete files\folders using the application. Please be careful with this operation. Files will be deleted permanently from the device after your confirmation and this action cannot be undone. In case you hid some files but before restoring them, you have uninstalled the app and now you cannot see those files. Don't worry!, your files will are still in your device but in a different location.(/sdcard/.hffiles/.files/). Just re-install the app to restore the files again.

You can post any ideas on our page: https://www.facebook.com/VardamirsGameStudio or place review with "have an idea" topic Would you like to have a puppy in your smartphone or tablet? Let me bring to your attention the game Cute Pocket Puppy 3D. In Cute Pocket Puppy 3D you can get a lovely puppy, that you should name and feed; you should play with him and take care of him. If you do not pay enough attention to your pet, he will run away. Mind that the puppy will constantly move and not sit in one place. Besides, he will run after a toy which you throw to him. In Cute Pocket Puppy 3D you can get different toys and kennels for your puppy. Moreover your pet will level up when you play with him or take care of him. Also you can take a part in competitions. A cute and fluffy puppy is waiting for your attention and affection. ***THIS GAME CONTAINS BANNER ADS AND INTERSTITIAL ADS***

description: For Singapore SBS and SMRT bus time. Two easy home screen widgets with very simplified design! A useful Singapore bus app that delights you. - Two unique home screen sg bus time widgets (1x1 & 4x2) - sort bus sg favourite by drag and release - view subsequent bus sg stops and last sg bus schedule time at stop - add unlimited number of 1x1 single sg bus widgets e.g. 1 for work and 1 for home. Please do not hesitate to email me if you need any assistance or have any idea to improve the SG Buses Delight 2 ++Widgets. Keep your feedback coming! Thank you very much. saitiam7 (at) gmail (dot) com. SG Buses Delight 2. Latest sg buses features.. - swipe for next nearest sg bus stop! - add user location on map - accurate nearest bus sg stop - fix crash on start up - edit stop name for favorite - add map button at stop - search stopId gives stopName - faster gps locator This app is not related to great apps like SG Buses, Easy SG Transport, SG NextBus, SBS Transit iris, smrt connect, myTransport SG and many other apps that make transportation in Singapore better. Cost: Free

Think you're a hardcore gamer? Try axis and think again. Tap the screen to rotate the colored square at the center of the screen and match the colors of the bars that'll run to you at full speed! Sounds easy enough, don't you think? Well, WRONG. Loud and powerful electro music will keep you company while you play, lose, scream, try again, ragequit. Rinse and repeat, because Axis will be an addictive ride! You'll hate this game. But you'll also love it. Maybe. -----------------------------------------------PERMISSIONS------------------------------------------------- ----- Internet, Access network state: Ads ----- Vibrate: Self-explanatory ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------KEYWORD---------------------------------------------------- ----- Axis - arcade - action - twitch - minimal - speed - game - hard - axis - indie ----- action game - survive - hd - graphics - stunning - survival - hardest - difficult - ----- high speed - fast - reflex ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

description: Ski Greece 2013-14 is back with brand new features. In the Live News section users are informed for the live data of the ski resorts. In the "Track My Day" section user can track their ski routes, see stats like overall distance and average speed and share these starts in the social media. In the "NotifyMe" section, users can subscribe to notifications about the condition in their favourite ski center. Users can also find local businesses around the ski centers in the "Nearby" section. Also, the "community section" includes a brand new social only for the ski/snowboard lovers. Internet access is required. Give us feedback in our mail: info@skigreece.gr
