The simplified edition of the best ebook reader on the market: user friendly, powerful, fast, this book reader provides unprecedented speed and reading comfort. Download thousands of free and paid ebooks, highlight excerpts, take notes in your books and contracts, organize your books, add your favorite catalogs in your "Bookstores" area and much more! This ebook reader has many possibilities: - an integrated reading tool that will surprise you with its smoothness and functional richness - an advanced library to organize and index your ebooks - a huge selection of bookstores can be set: one click access to thousands of books - possibility to sync your library across all your devices and to share ebooks / notes through the paid service Mantano Cloud Overview • Support of the most common ebook formats (EPUB2, PDF) • Support of Adobe DRM, allowing to read ebooks protected against hacking • Integrated OPDS browser, with the option to add your own URL addresses to customize your bookstore area • Integrated File explorer, great for importing specific ebooks by browsing your device (Only in Essentials and Premium editions) • Compatible with Mantano Cloud service Reading • Customize the display of EPUB books thanks to predefined or custom created themes: font, line height, colors, etc. (custom themes only in Essentials and Premium editions) • Advanced support of PDF books: Fast vertical and horizontal scroll, Pan & Zoom, optimized display speed • Search function in the book content • Many ways to annotate your ebook: highlighting, adding text notes to a page or to an highlight • Pinable navigation panel for a quick access to the table of content, bookmarks, highlights and notes • Night mode Organizing your library • Index your books by tags and rating • Group your books into your personal collections • Book filtering functions by tags, collections, authors... • Several display modes: detailed list and thumbnails More features with Mantano Cloud (requiring a separate paid subscription on http://cloud.mantano.com ): • Sync your library between your devices: Switch between your phone and tablet and always find your books, annotations, notes, reading positions, collections, tags, ratings, bookmarks, discussions, contacts along with you, in their most recent state. • Shared reading : Transform your books and documents into digital reading circles by sharing annotations and learn from each others' experience. Share your ebooks with your friends, learn from their notes, discuss with them. More detailed description with editions comparison available here: http://store.mantano.com/reader/editions_comparison.htm Other ebook reader apps: - Supporting Adobe DRM: Aldiko, Kobo, Bluefire - Not Supporting Adobe DRM: Moon + Reader, RepliGo, Laputa, Cool Reader, ezPDF, Adobe Reader, FBReader. Tags: book, ebook, book reader, ebook reader, epub reader, pdf reader, ebook speech, dictionary, lexicon, library, bookstore, opds, tts, epub, pdf, ebook annotate.

description: It’s time to bring Armageddon down on your enemies in this fast-paced, unique RTS! What's in store for you: - Nuclear Winter - Unique offensive and defensive game play unlike any other RTS - Multiple upgrade paths - Intense arcade like action - Plenty of life or death split second decisions - 3 tutorial missions to show you the ropes - Quick Play mode - A fun campaign - Amazing graphics inspired by the inside of a real nuclear missile silo - Lots of fun We've listened and added campaign difficulty settings and compatibility with a lot more Android devices. Here are a few tips for those of you having trouble with the campaign: - The more advanced defensive missiles become critical in the late campaign. Capture the terrain types that will allow you to build them. It's possible to win without them but very hard! - Learn to watch your defensive screen and offensive screen at the same time so you can help your automated defenses out when they are being overwhelmed. - Try reinforcing your own territories by landing another transport on them. This way if a missile slips through you don't lose your hard won territory. - A transport 'rush' using 4-5 transports into a terrain tile is a valid and effective way to capture it from your enemy. - If you are still having trouble, go back and do the tutorial and learn more about the terrain types and missile types. "5/5 stars for an RTS game that I almost missed in a crowded Market" - meandmydroid.blogspot.com A multi-player edition of Silo MAD is coming in a few months. If you enjoy multi-player strategy games, check out our Robot Football Pro game! Best wishes and thank you for buying our game.
release_text: Campaign difficulty High & Low detail for better performance on older devices Improved compatibility with a number of tablets and many other devices. Install to SD card

description: Make your nights quieter now! Snore No More monitors your sleep and is able to recognize snoring sounds. It can wake you up when you snore by vibrating or ringing. It also logs the activity of the night so you know when and how many times you snored. Calibrate the microphone for better results!
release_text: Better log management. (Long-press to delete) Bug fixes. Important: only *snoring* is detected not just any random loud sound. Coughing, sneezing, mumbling won't trigger any alert. The algorithm needs some time to detect snoring; alert is triggered with a 3 to 10 seconds delay after the moment you actually started snoring. *Samsung Galaxy not supported yet*

Get ready to make tasty, delicious, healthy and mouthwatering fruit salad with Fruit Salad Maker - the latest cooking game of its kind. Choose from a wide range of fruits, such as strawberries, apples, bananas, oranges and kiwis; cut and slice them using your very own fruit cutter and treat yourself to a delicious bowl of fruit salad. Making fruit salad has never been this easy, with Fruit Salad Maker, kids can create their very own fruit salad recipes. They can customize their servings using a wide variety of toppings, ice creams, bowls and even background and themes. Features: ✔Kids game for 3 year old and 4 year old game ✔ Thousands of possible combinations for making your very own Fruit Salad. ✔ Several unique decoration categories, each with 10+ items. ✔ A reward system that gives you ICAWNs for every salad bowl that you make, these can be used to unlock more items. ✔ You can save your created fruit salad and show it to your friends and family. ✔ Colorful, vibrant visuals. Fruit Salad Maker - Copyright © ICAW – 2014

A quiet walk through the forest is now impossible as in this alien tower defense game they have attacked it and are after the natural resources. Your task is pretty hard as they are attacking you with all they have got but you will not be defenseless as you have plenty of towers to build in this alien shooting game. Keep in mind that they cost resources to build so you will need to manage them as in any great strategy game. Always look for places to build them as when the aliens pass you will be able to shoot them down and the crucial thing is that you will keep the forest safe in this alien killing game. As soon as you can you should upgrade your towers so they gain a higher rate of fire and also more power. Enjoy making some justice and keep our wildlife safe from the attackers in this tower defense game online. All this and tons more in the latest version of this alien defense game.

The Smurfs' village is in chaos, and it's up to Smurfette to solve the mystery before Gargamel finds their village. Complete puzzles by mixing and matching Smurfy objects and save the Smurfs. ------------------------ What's New • 30 new Smurftastic levels (131 – 160) • 5 new outfits for Smurfette • Bug fixes and lots of performance improvements ------------------------ Features: - Help Smurfette save the village! - Swap puzzle pieces to match three or more Smurfy objects at a time to clear pieces and complete levels - Line up four or more Smurfy objects in a row to unlock powerups - Make your way through 160 Smurf-tacular levels - Use powerful Smurfy boosters featuring your favorite characters to breeze through levels - Sync with Facebook to track your progress against your friends ------------------------ Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/BeelineGames Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/BeelineGames Follow us on Youtube: www.youtube.com/BeelineGames ------------------------ PLEASE NOTE: Smurfette's Magic Match is free to play, but charges real money for additional in-app content. You may lock out the ability to purchase in-app content by adjusting your device’s settings.

description: Walk Tracker is a GPS based tracking app for people who want to keep track of their walking fitness goals. STATS AND MAPS Walk Tracker tracks speed, distance, altitude, and time. It also gives you a map showing where you have been while you are saving a walk. GRAPHS See graph of altitude vs. distance showing you all the climbs you made on your last walk. COLOR CODED When viewing saved walks your route shows up on the map color coded by speed. It shows where you went the fastest (red) and where you were slowest (blue). VOICE SUMMARY Don't want to look at the screen every few minutes? You can have Walk Tracker tell you updates on your progress either every mile or every five minutes. PAUSE AND RESUME Pause the workout to catch your breath or chat with a friend and then resume when you get back to walking. LARGE DISPLAY You can easily see your stats in real time with your current speed being the focal point. UNITS The supports both standard and metric units. Keep track of all your fitness goals with Walk Tracker+ GPS Fitness Tracking for Walkers. Note: Continued use of the GPS will reduce battery life. Note: Some features are only available in the Pro version - Walk Tracker+
release_text: 1.04 Fixed a bug when tracking in the background on some phones 1.03 Adding graphing to show altitude vs distance 1.01 New custom list giving more information about each walk 1.0 First release including: -Stats and Maps -Color coded tracks to see where you went the fastest -Voice summary so that you can get updates without looking at the screen -Pause and resume for stop lights or for catching up with a friend -Large easy to read display -Units, standard and metric support

description: The new match 3 puzzle game from the makers of hit app, Bubble Mania! Swap jewels to match 3 or more and create waves of excitement and brilliant visuals! ★ MATCH JEWELS in 480+ puzzles - each one is unique and full of fun and amazing challenges! ★ DAZZLING PUZZLES like smashing glass and digging for treasure keep the fun flowing! ★ CREATE COMBOS by matching rare jewels and create amazing cascades! ★ DISCOVER rare Magic Diamonds and Rainbow Stars by making big matches! ★ EASY TO LEARN - hard to master! Can you score high enough to earn 3 stars on every level? ★ MASTER tricky obstacles like walls, pitfalls, and puzzling portals! ★ BEAUTIFUL backgrounds as you solve puzzles at amazing places with your puppy companion! ★ TOP-NOTCH performance on all Android phones and tablets! Animated jewels, effects, and characters! ★ FREE updates with new puzzles, boosts, and more! Jewel Mania is the BEST-looking FREE jewel matching game for your Android device. Please note: Your device must have an active internet connection to download additional levels. Please note that Jewel Mania™ is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to the Google Play Store, tap the Menu button, select Settings > Use PIN for purchase. Then, set up the four-digit PIN on the option below. In addition, Jewel Mania™ may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services. TeamLava, a Storm8 studio, is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer on Android. Use of this application is governed by the TeamLava Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to TeamLava's Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.teamlava.com/terms and www.teamlava.com/privacy. Follow Storm8 www.storm8.com facebook.com/storm8 twitter.com/storm8

Woman Menstrual Calendar (Feminap) is simple and easy to use. This multifunctional menstrual calendar will help you track and monitor your menstrual cycles and take care of your health. Woman Calendar includes a number of other useful tools for you. Features: - This Menstrual Calendar is easy-to-use. - The calendar offers a very intuitive user interface. - The program is password protected which helps you keep all your data in privacy. - The calendar allows you to keep track of your menstrual cycles and view that information . - The program helps calculate ovulation and your fertile days. - Menstrual Calendar can be used to show you which days are the best to have sexual relations if you want a baby. - With this Menstrual Calendar you can create your temperature statistics. It will help you to prognose your individual ovulation accurate. - With this calendar you can create your weight statistics. - Woman Calendar allows you to create notes very easily and even assign reminder so you won't forget them. - In addition, by using our application, you can track your own daily biorhythm. With Biorhythms you can have more awareness of themselves and plan their activities in the most favorable. - This application has to offer is a complete analysis of biorhythms marked with different colors and they show in percentages the physical, intellectual, emotional. You can improve the quality of your lives by monitoring the highs and lows of these cycles and acting accordingly. - You can personalize it with your own dates of pregnancy, personal notes, etc. - Woman Calendar includes a module pregnancy. - Each week of pregnancy includes a description of your baby's development, as well as an explanation of the changes taking place in your body. You'll also find recommendation that will help keep you and your baby healthy. - This menstrual calendar will help you track your pregnancy symptoms, monitor your weight throughout your pregnancy. - Besides, Woman Calendar is a simple application to help you count your baby movements with Kick Counter. Kick Counter is an easy way to count your baby's kicks during pregancy. Kick Counter is a way to help you know if your baby is active and healthy. Simply click the button and Kick Counter will stop the time and keep track of the number of movements. - Kick Counter lets you view all past kick counts which makes it easy to see if your baby was more or less active than usual. Counting and tracking your baby’s movements is a safe and very simple way to monitor the well-being of your baby everyday during the third trimester. - This Menstrual Calendar offers you a guide to the pelvic floor muscle training. Easy to follow Kegel exercises and daily reminders making this the easy way for both women to strengthen their pelvic floor muscles. Kegel exercises can be done during pregnancy or after childbirth to try to prevent urinary incontinence. Kegel exercises might also be helpful for women who have persistent difficulty reaching orgasm. - You can do Kegel exercises discreetly just about any time. For any kind of exercises to be effective and beneficial they need to be done regularly and for a prolonged period of time. Daily reminders to alert you to perform the exercises. - You can perform the scheduled events once per day, or more, just specify the start, stop, and time between as needed. You can customize the program to your needs.

You’ve been waiting. It’s here. Lighting designers, specifiers and sales professionals can now access our industry-leading luminaire portfolio anytime, from anywhere. Do you have what it takes to conquer the world's deadliest roads? Join Hugh, Lisa, and Alex in Ice Road Truckers the game as you battle the toughest winter roads the world has to offer. description: Are you ready to accept the gift of madness and understand the secrets of the deep? If yes — “Mental Hospital” is waiting for you. The story of Mental Hospital begins with a banal event in the life of a young reporter. Agreed to film a special forces raid tasking at the Psychiatric Hospital, he started his work. But in an absurd accident he has been arrested at the office. In order to get at least something from such a bargain, you (as this reported) still hesitant to go to the hospital, and shoot for the scene at least something meaningful. Incredibly powerful, creepy atmosphere. It will keep you in suspense, not allowing to relax for a minute. The game is built on the Unity3D engine, which allows it to issue a picture at the level of modern horror computer games.

"Storytelling book" has become "Yomiage Ehon"! We are pleased to announce that we have released "Yomiage Ehon", a new storytelling book as a replacement of "Storytelling book (Yomikikase Digital Ehon)", bringing dozens of improvements. There are nineteen stories to play at first without charge, and more of upcoming stories soon! ** For "Storytelling book" users. ** We sincerely appreciate your enjoyment with "Storytelling book" and supporting us. There is no further plans to update those "Storytelling book" app series due to this update so you can download "Yomiage Ehon" on Google Play and still enjoy equivalent stories with Yomiage Ehon as it used to be. We hope you keep interested in "Yomiage Ehon" and your support. "Yomiage Ehon" is a free picture book application that reads out a story with heartwarming pictures and scripts! Enjoy the masterpiece of picture books from all over the world, with narration and subtitles! ◎ Application and also its picture books are free of charge ◎ You can download and enjoy those stories totally free; "The Moon Princess" as preinstalled "The Cut Tongue Sparrow" "The Grateful Crane" "The Magical Ashes" "The Angel's Robe" "Taro the dragon Baby" "Moa-kaikai and the Snake God" "The Rice-ball Rolled Down" "The Miracle Straw Millionaire" "Pedrito and the trange Horse" "Agrimaka" "Kobutori Jiisan" "Like a Cloud" "The Hare and the Tortoise" "Dungaree the Stray Cat" "Click-click Mountain" "The Seasonal Workers and the Big Snake" "The Dragon God of Suttsu" "A Big Flood" "Kintaro" "The Girl Who Turned to Be A Bone" "The Battle of Monkey and the Crab" "The Six Jizos" "The Red and The Blue Fans" We are going to sequentially release more of masterpiece of picture books of Japan and the world. We included advertisement in this application, as we're planning further improvements for this app and yet to keep the app free of charge. Thank you for your patience and understanding. ◎ Here are good things of using this ・For story-telling to your kids. ・You can enjoy high quality stories in Japanese / English. ・All voices and subtitles can be changed to Japanese / English. ・English improvements for you adults. ・You can learn right pronunciation by the story-telling voice of the native speakers enjoyably. ◎ "Yomiage Ehon" brings: ・You can access many picture books easily and anytime with your device. ・You can choose whichever combination of languages for reading-out and subtitles. For example, English audio and Japanese subtitles, or Japanese audio and English subtitles can be possible. ・Player screen can be both portrait and landscape. ・You can operate the player by "tap and flick" or control buttons on the player screen. ・You can choose 3 subtitle font size. ・You can choose whether you preferably watch a story with subtitles or without. ・By repeating same pages, it also can be used for intellectual training, language learning, and more. ■ Target device: Android 2.2 or higher dcWORKS Co., Ltd have announced that the free smartphone applications, "Story-telling digital picture book" and "Yomiage Ehon", are launched since 2010 supported by "International Digital EHON Association". ※ The picture book offered by this application are digitized from the original picture books of which copyrights are held by International Digital EHON Association. ※ For more details of "International Digital EHON Association", please visit http://www.e-hon.jp/idea/index_id.htm

description: The most amazing Farkle comes live on Play Store for you. If you are new to Farkle, then it’s an awesome tricky game that can entice you to keep playing. A dice game of luck and wit, Farkle is very popular throughout the world. Dominated mainly in the casinos, where you bet and play your best move to win. You can only begin Farkle by throwing 6 dice. You can build up "a dice throw or hands", such as 3 of a kind, straights, doubles etc, and score high each time you play the game. If you need to stay in the game and score high, you need to score during the buildup. If you fail to score, then you would Farkle and lose all the points you won in that round Score as high as possible in the 10 rounds Game Feature: •Awesome Casino Dice Game •Perfect AI for all your moves •Highly addictive and challenging •2 modes – Play and Bet •3 Powerups – Avoid Farkle, Double your score, Extra Round •Unlimited fun

app_name: N2 TTS用追加声質データ(男声B)
description: 「N2 TTS」用の追加声質データです。「N2 TTS」がインストールされた端末に、さらに本パッケージを追加でインストールすることにより、「N2 TTS」に個性的な男声声質4種類が追加されます。 【対応バージョン】 N2 TTS 1.4.2以降 (本パッケージの利用には、Android 4.0以降が必要です。) 【使用方法】 「N2 TTS」がインストールされた端末に、本パッケージを追加でインストールしてください。 【利用規約について】 本パッケージが提供するデータは「N2 TTS利用規約」における「コンテンツ」に該当します。 「N2 TTS利用規約」は「N2 TTS」の「N2 TTS 設定」→「利用規約」でご確認いただけます。また、利用規約はKDDI研究所ホームページにも掲載しております: http://www.kddilabs.jp/products/audio/n2tts/ 【外部への情報送信について】 本アプリケーションは、入力されたテキスト及びその統計情報(単語出現頻度等)、声質選択履歴及び選択頻度情報を含め、端末からお客様情報を外部に送信することはございません。 【Twitterアカウント】 http://twitter.com/n2tts It is an additional voice data of "N2 TTS" for. By the terminal "N2 TTS" is installed, install additional packages this further, four male voice quality and unique will be added to the "N2 TTS". [Correspondence version] N2 TTS 1.4.2 or later (The use of this package, Android 4.0 or later is required.) [Usage] terminal to the "N2 TTS" has been installed, please install additional this package. [Terms and Conditions] data This package provides is true in the "N2 TTS Terms of Use" and "content". You can check the "N2 TTS", "N2 TTS Settings" → "Terms of Use" and "N2 TTS Terms of Use". In addition, we are on to KDDI R & D Laboratories Website Terms and Conditions: http://www.kddilabs.jp/products/audio/n2tts/ About the transmission of information to the outside] This application, which including (term frequency, etc.), the selection frequency information and voice quality selection history, to be sent to the external customer information from the terminal does not have the statistical information and the entered text. [Twitter account] http://twitter.com/n2tts

Welcome to PRIP – the truly instant communication app for you and the people you interact with the most. Use PRIP from anywhere. To anywhere. Worldwide. Just push the button and get right through. It’s the best way to get connected right away. PRIP lets you: • Talk instantly with any PRIP user worldwide. • Include up to 20 people at once with the NEW PRIP GROUP CALLING feature. • Communicate in High Definition (HD) Voice. • Connect directly with millions of Nextel Radio service users across Latin America. • Use any 3G, 4G, or Wi-Fi connection. • Send Alerts to notify someone that you want to talk immediately. • Send a Voice Message when you can’t talk. • Automatically import contacts. • No ads. • $1.99 per month -- and your 1st month is FREE! To sign up, visit:  https://store.prip.me/ PRIP is also THE ONLY APP that instantly connects to Nextel Radio service across Latin America! We’re proud of the growing number of delighted PRIP users. description: NOAA Radar Plus is a professional application with professional features not found in your average weather app. NOAA Radar Plus plugs directly into NOAA's weather sources delivering you the most accurate and timely weather data available (Its what the pros use)! This app literarily encompasses more data than 10 apps put together! SEVERE WEATHER: See Active Advisories From The NWS: *Type Of Advisory And When It Expires *Detailed Description Of Advisory INTERACTIVE MAP: 6 Animated Overlay Options: *High-Res Radar *Satellite *Global Satellite *Visible Satellite *Current Temps *Current Winds 8 Non Animated Options: *NWS Advisories *NWS Warning Polygons *Snow Depth *Dew point *Humidity *Wind Chill *Heat Index *Sea Surface Temps *Current Chlorophyll Point Data: *Storm Cells *Storm Reports *Climate Records *Earthquakes *Wildfires GENERAL WEATHER: * Detailed Weather Forecasts * NWS Watches, Warnings and Advisories * Hourly Forecasts * Weekend Only Forecasts * 10 Day Forecasts Disclaimer: Not recommend for non US locations. In addition radar and most map overlays are currently only supported over the continental USA, Alaska, Hawaii and Puerto Rico.
release_text: NEW: Adds support for Celsius temperatures Greatly improves Storm Cell cones and colors Added hourly forecasts up to 24 hrs under Detailed forecast view Added 14 day forecasts under Extended Forecast view Changed app color scheme from blue to gray along with better clarity Removed unused weather modules until activated FIXED: Crash bugs and various other improvements to make the app even better. Please keep the reviews coming. This motivates us to keep these free updates coming! Be safe!

description: It’s amazing how pen and paper, two inventions dating back to thousands of years ago, have been almost irreplaceable. Until now. Inheriting the best inking feature from the popular Notes Plus app, now with its own automatic palm and wrist rejection, INKredible will make writing on a tablet feel as good as, or even greater than, pen on paper. You have to try it to believe it. It’s incredible! SIMPLE INKredible has only ONE single mission: to create an outstanding writing experience on a tablet. It is meant to be distraction-free. In fact most of the time, you will not see any UI controls or buttons, just a blank sheet of paper to write on. BEAUTIFUL With more than 3 years of R&D in vector-graphics inking technology, we are confident INKredible - with a sophisticated manipulation of Bezier curves - will make your handwriting look more beautiful than on paper. Even more specially, it will look good in any resolution, for printing or displaying purposes. Just zoom in and you will see why INKredible is unique among other handwriting apps. … and, well, PERFECT! OK, the INKredible writing experience on a tablet might not be perfect, but it is as close to perfection as you can find. It is FREE. Try it today and see for yourself.
release_text: - Hot-fix the bug in closeup box - Improve the selection gesture ------------------ - Library management 2.0: support for folders. - You can now buy all pens and papers at a single package price. - New "S Pen Only" Mode. - Support for right-to-left writing in close-up view. - Support Russian language - Inking improvements. - Bug fixes & other improvements.

description: Tyrannosaurus Rex lives in a colorful, kid-friendly prehistoric world filled with fun and a surprising number of hot peppers. Watch him run, jump, eat, and play; then take control and watch him follow your commands! This friendly dinosaur is here to entertain your children in a constructive way, encouraging imagination while teaching hand-eye coordination. Perfect for toddlers and preschoolers! •NEVER any advertisements or objectionable content. We respect your children's safety and privacy! •Vibrant, High Definition graphics keep toddlers engaged and entertained! •Kids love the fluid dinosaur animation and silly sounds! •No losing; kids engage in imaginative play without frustration •Free demonstration mode included, upgrade to permanently enable all controls and animations! •Simple dinosaur controls that any child can master in seconds!. •New animations and surprises added in updates! •Child lock to help prevent unintended purchase For kids age 2-4, or anyone that loves dinosaurs! If you have ANY questions or problems with this game, don't hesitate to contact us at support@outerroads.com , and we'll get back to you as soon as possible! Please include a detailed description of your problem as well as what device you're using. Take Sonic and Tails for a spin in this Lite version of Sonic The Hedgehog™ 4 Episode II! The Sonic 4 Saga continues in Episode II with the return of a beloved side kick and fan-favorite villains! Following the events of Episode I, Metal Sonic has returned to form a formidable alliance with Dr. Eggman! To face this new evil, Sonic will have to call upon an old friend to help him save the day! Now joined by Tails, race across four brand new Zones and take down fearsome new badniks with deadly combination moves in order to put an end to this dastardly duo’s plans! New and Improved Episode II features an all-new engine; bringing you gameplay with updated physics and Zones in stunning HD graphics. Collaborative Play Team up with a friend via Bluetooth and take control of Sonic and Tails as they battle against Dr. Eggman and Metal Sonic! Lock-on with Episode Metal Users who own both Episodes I & II will unlock an exclusive scenario featuring Metal Sonic! Explore four Acts across four reworked Zones from Episode I and experience the story of Metal Sonic's revival after his defeat in Sonic CD!

release_text: v2.0 - Improved app start up time, it will now launch much faster and take less storage space. - Reduced ad frequency. - qHD support, further tablet optimizations. - Misc. bug and crash fixes.

description: Spotty Pad games for young children was inspired by Mr Tumble’s Tumble Tap device, which features on the BBC CBeebies television channel. It is legally different. The Tumble Tap does not do anything that Spotty Pad does. Spotty Pad consists of eight games for young children. The first – Photo Show – is suitable for children of pre-reading age. It displays a photo and plays a music clip. It uses your device’s text to speech engine (we recommend the Google text to speech engine, free on Google Play) to read out the text of the photo to reinforce what everyday (mostly) images are called. You can your own images, too. The remaining games require a degree of understanding of words. In Word Tap, the child is given an image and two words – one correct and one incorrect. The child needs to tap the correct word to score a point. In other games, the child needs to know the names of colours or shapes and in the classic “I spy with my little eye” the child needs to be able to tap on the correct image from a choice of three. Chaser, Super Chaser and Duplicator are increasingly difficult games with moving circles. In the free trial version of Spotty Pad, each game can only be played five times. For full details of what Spotty Pad does and doesn’t do, see the PDF guide at www.jrsoft.co.uk/spottypad/spguide.zip
release_text: Spotty Pad version 1.3 Added: Favourites function for Photo Show. Inspired by a two-year-old who wanted cat, cat, cat! To set a photo as Favourite, go to Menu>Manage Photos. Select image and go to Edit. Set or unset Favourite. To control showing frequency, go to Menu>Manage Photos and select whether Favourites show: -- All the time. -- Just more frequently than non-favourites. -- Or Favoutites function off.

description: An open source book cataloguing application (source on github). Books can be added manually, by ISBN, or barcode. Remember to backup and export your existing catalogue before you upgrade! Book Catalogue is NOT a book reader. Features include: * Sorting by author (last name), title, series, etc. * user-defined sort and list styles * Search Amazon, Google Books, goodreads and LibraryThing for data * Searching * Thumbnails (download, gallery or camera) * Loaning books * goodreads synchronization * Export and Backup * Bookshelves (books can be on multiple shelves) Want a wishlist? Just create a bookshelf called 'Wishlist' and start adding books. Please email us (below) if you have any issues after an upgrade. Wiki can be found at: https://github.com/eleybourn/Book-Catalogue/wiki Full history at: https://raw.github.com/eleybourn/Book-Catalogue/master/README Recent History: New in 5.1.0 * Italian translation (Eugenio Davolio) * Spanish translation (José M. Galdo) * Turkish translations (Emir Sarı) * Ability to archive only new/updated books and to exclude covers (or books) * Better thumbnail size in lists for high density screens * Added options to see books by author/series at Amazon * Other minor bug fixes New in 5.0.8 * More German translation updates (Robert Wetzlmayr) New in 5.0.7 * Fixes to bugs introduced in 5.0.5! New in 5.0.1-5.0.5 * Style 'Added date' is now in descending order for Android 2.2+ * New field: Language * Minor Performance improvements for Android 2.2+ * Translation updates (Imkal) * Bug fixes New in 5.0.0 * A non-editable view of book details, with 'fling' support! (Nick Silin) * Archiving of entire catalogue, including books, covers, preferences and styles * Updated and improved interface, including Action Bar suppor (should work better on devices without menu buttons) * Support for pic2shop scanner * More French translation updates (Imkal & Djiko) * More German translation updates (Robert Wetzlmayr) * More Russian translation updates (Nick Silin) * Bug fixes
release_text: New in 5.1.x * Italian translation (Eugenio Davolio) * Spanish translation (José M. Galdo) * Turkish translations (Emir Sarı) * Ability to archive only new/updated books and to exclude covers (or books) * Better thumbnail size in lists for high density screens * Added options to see books by author/series at Amazon * New list styles and groups * Bug fixes

description: The Top Rated medication reminder, if you need to track your medications, this is the app for you! MediSafe is a beautiful, visual and easy-to-use pill reminder and medication management app. It will help you take your medicine on time and safely. It also allows you to help your family members with their pills. ---> Download MediSafe, and start managing your medication right now! Whether you are taking one medicine or more, you know how difficult it is remembering to take each one at the right time. If you are a caretaker for a parent, child, or patient, you know how stressful it is not knowing for sure if your loved one took their pills on time. MediSafe has the solution. It's free and simple! MediSafe will remind you when to take your medication. You can also update your app manually. Your Med-Friend (family member or caretaker) is notified if you don’t check in, so they can remind you only if needed. ---> Download MediSafe, never forget a medicine dose again! Free features: • Visual and super easy to handle Medication Reminder. • Synchronizes the family medicine pillboxes to one place. • Reminds you to take your medication on time, even if your device is asleep. • Choose your meds reminder sound to make MediSafe a comfortable addition to your day. • High end graphics that look great on HD Displays. • See a list of what medication are "due today" and check them off as you go. • Rx refill reminds you when you need to restock on medicine. • List PRN (on demand) medication. • See your progress report and send it to the doctor as an Excel file. • Sync reminders with your Android Wear smartwatch. Shake your wrist to mark that you took the medication. Free extra features, after registration: • Syncing family members' devices and medication in real time. • Automatic secured backup and restore on the Medisafe cloud server (HIPAA compliant servers). ---> Download MediSafe, never worry about family meds doses anymore! Please watch these instructional videos: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eCRpF0b1MPc http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pR-Z5ymsMig Featured in: +Fox News: http://fxn.ws/1ndAZhW +The Next Web: http://tnw.co/Rr6U1G +Pando Daily: http://bit.ly/1qO6UVB +Mashable: http://on.mash.to/1kCPPft +Fast Company: http://bit.ly/1hXRC9n +Information week: http://ubm.io/1gKNgXt +Med City News: http://bit.ly/1r25PYz +Inside Mobile Apps: http://bit.ly/Qr9pjo And many others... Medi Safe is well adjusted for managing medications for many complex health conditions such as Diabetes, heart conditions and cancer treatments, but also as a convenient reminder for taking birth control lady pills, contraceptives and vitamins. Reduce your stress and improve health with Medi-Safe - the best medication reminder ! App permissions information “Read your contacts” – if you choose to add a Med-Friend to sync your meds to, you’ll be presented with a contact picker listing your contacts for your convenience. MediSafe never stores your address book content and doesn’t access your address book without your control. “Find accounts on the device” – used in push messaging. In case family member forgets a medication, we will notify you via push notification and offer to intervene. If everything is free how do we make business? We have paid versions that we sell to pharma companies, pharmacies, hospitals and healthcare providers. Running into issues? Send an email to info@medisafeproject.com We will appreciate to hear any suggestions or ideas you have. Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/MedisafeProject Twitter: http://twitter.com/medisafeproject FAQs: http://www.medisafeproject.com/faqs Thanks, MediSafe team
release_text: Join our Beta Community: http://goo.gl/ieIi1O v.4.7.3: - Bug fixes - When entering a new stock refill you can now type the exact quantity in addition to plus/minus buttons - An option to delete your measurements - New avatars If you gave us less than 5 stars, we'll appreciate if you'll rewrite your review :)

description: An easy to use to-do list in Getting Things Done (GTD) way. GTD Organizer is task/to-do management app, which will help you organize your stuff, powerful enough to manage your things, but simple enough to use it with pleasure. Features: - Nesting of tasks eg: shopping->grocery store->buy carrots. - Tasks are grouped into contexts. - Reminding of task's to be done. - Clean interface. Keywords: to do, GTD, Organizer, GTD, calendar, tasks, projects, easy
release_text: 1.06 - Long description of tasks (or projects) added - Request done by user in app's comments. - Context renamed to category. 1.05 - Properties screen added where user can change between 24 and 12 hours display mode. 1.04 - Ability to freely move tasks and projects across contexts and hierarchy - Breadcrumbs control added 1.03 - Hints are now displayed while creating new task or project. 1.02 - Nicer looking background. 1.01 - Improved translation.

description: 'Click to Symbols' app allows fastly inserting lots of different special chars to your messages everywhere. Just open the app and select a symbol - it will be automatically copied to the clipboard. App can be attached to the system bar or to the search key. Simeji is also supported. Less clicks, more convenient! P.S.: there's also a huge char tables, you can enable it in the settings. Some chars in these tables aren't supported by all Android phones. Some custom ROMs, such as MIUI, can display its. P.P.S.: if you have anything to say - please leave a comment, I'll be pleased! :)
release_text: Some bugs were fixed. Some symbols were rearranged.

Wild Animal Jigsaw Puzzle with popular wild animals from around the world. Each animal has associated information with interesting facts about the animal. You could also get further information by following the links to information sites such as Wikipedia. . Features lots of puzzles with progressively increasing difficulty allowing even preshool kids to start easy and build their problem solving skills slowly. Jigsaw puzzles improve the hand-eye co-ordination and visual perception of toddlers. . Thanks to the educational info provided with each of the animal photos, school students can learn as they play. . The wild animals covered in this puzzle include Elephant, Giraffe, Gorilla, Hippo, Hyena, Jackal, Kangaroo, Koala, Lemur, Leopard, Lion, Monkey, Orangutan, Panda, Rhino, Tiger, Zebra and more. Give it a try today!

NYU Bus Tracker is a new and upgraded way to navigate the NYU bus system. It combines the real-time information provided by TransLoc with the scheduled times provided by the University bus system. No more dealing with those large PDFs. Features - Real time locations for all of the buses - Scheduled departure times for all buses - Full offline support - Call Safe Ride - And more! This app is open source! Check it out on Github: https://github.com/tpalsulich/NYU-BusTracker-Android

Child can choose: levels mode to improve reaction skills or endless mode just for fun. Nice surprises a waiting for you in some balloons, that you can collect. Gra Odlotowe Wieżowce to gra strategiczna w przeglądarce on-line. Przyciąga swoją fabułą i danymi ekonomicznymi. W tym samym czasie gra ponad 3 000 osób. Twoim celem jest zbudowanie Odlotowego Wieżowca. Liczba kondygnacji jest nieograniczona. Trzeba tylko mieć wystarczająco dużo środków na ich budowę. Dwie główne waluty w grze to monety i banknoty. Po zbudowaniu każdej kondygnacji budynku gracz musi podjąć decyzję co umieści na tym piętrze. Piętro można przeznaczyć do zamieszkania lub wybrać jedną z dziedzin biznesowych. Na przykład rozrywkę, sztukę, czy żywność. Twoi pracownicy żyją w strefie mieszkalnej Twojego wieżowca. Należy pamiętać, że pracownicy wirtualni Odlotowego Wieżowca mają różne talenty i preferencje, tak jak w rzeczywistości. Ktoś jest dobry w sprzedaży ciastek, inni są przygotowani do pracy w przemyśle rozrywkowym. Możesz zobaczyć kwalifikacje każdego pracownika, jak tylko on lub ona przeniesie się do budynku. W celu zwiększenia sprzedaży w niektórych przedsiębiorstwach, wybór pracowników musi odbywać się ze szczególną odpowiedzialnością. Gra oferuje wiele narzędzi do kontroli działalności gospodarczej oraz monitorowanie nastroju lokatorów. Na pierwszy rzut oka gra może wydawać się nudna i monotonna. Ale po wybudowaniu dziesiątego piętra, założeniu firmy i przeprowadzce do budynku, będziesz musiał zajmować się różnymi aspektami gry, biorąc pod uwagę dochody i wydatki. Tak szybko, jak to możliwe każdy będzie mógł Cię sprawdzić. Play Totally skyscrapers is a strategy game in the browser on-line. It attracts your story and economic data. At the same time, the game more than 3 000. Your goal is to build a waste Skyscraper. Number of stories are unlimited. You just need to have enough funds for their construction. The two main currency in the game are coins and banknotes. After the construction of each floor of the building the player must decide whether to put this floor. Floor can be used to address or select one of the business areas. For example, entertainment, art, and food. Your employees live in a residential area of ​​your building. Keep in mind that employees exhaust virtual Skyscraper have different talents and preferences, as in reality. Someone is good at selling cakes, others are prepared to work in the entertainment industry. You can see the qualifications of each employee, as soon as he or she moves into the building. In order to increase sales in some companies, the selection of staff must take particular responsibility. The game offers a variety of tools to control and monitor the business mood tenants. At first glance, the game may seem boring and monotonous. But after building the tenth floor, starting a business and moving into the building, you will have to deal with different aspects of the game, taking into account the income and expenses. As soon as possible, everyone can see you.

Assistive Touch Description: Assistive Touch is a copy of the IPHONE assistive touch application, failure of the cell phone for those buttons, this is absolutely an artifact level saviour and It is easy touch every key you want,Try to use ~ There are more and more Android phones, and many are using entity key, according to many, will naturally appear more or less problems, like the return key, power failure or sometimes completely unable to use, virtual buttons assistant can solve these problems, for your mobile phone provides a chance to reborn. Function description: 1, Virtual system keys, such as the back, menu, power, home, search, tasks,etc; 2, Can be a key to open the system application; 3, Virtual point can freely control the size, transparency, animation, etc. 4, Low requirement to the mobile phone, memory and power consumption is small, some functions need root authority; 5, A key screenshots, convenient and quick. 6,Display connection speed; 7, virtual panel can reset size; Note: 1, Some functions need root authority; 2, If your device has a root, and still can't use, please select the method two or three in the set; 3, New MIUI system and other users of the system in the set, please open the application of the required permissions, can in the desktop display window. Historical development: In July 2012, I had just quit my job, because it's free, so with reference to the iphone's virtual assistant to do a simple application, Then the first version released in August 2012, then it will be published source code, source code download address: https://code.google.com/p/assistivetouch/ Maintains a period of time, back into the worker be in September, then how to manage, let its development, and a year later, found that quite many people in use, But also quite many people left behind a message a lot of support, let me very touched, as an application developer, actually more power is your support. So, in October 2013 will be released it on Google Play, and then slowly, the user is built up, in the user's suggestion, the adaptation of traditional, English. After is updated occasionally. Now, I resigned in August 2014, in free time a week, a large number of reconstructed the virtual buttons assistant, make it more flexible and more quickly. And tomorrow, I will be in again, so the record here. CodeBoy 8/24/2014 The future development: 1, automatic virtual key transparent; 2, virtual keys can customize image; 3, virtual panel screen (slide); 4, quick to join some functions, such as wifi, bluetooth, volume, vibration, bookmarks, etc.; Temporarily thought of so many, any Suggestions please email me! About CodeBoy: CodeBoy team is a team project in his spare time is devoted to the interest, the slogan is:do something different! Now, only me. Welcome advice, feedback problems. Email: codeboy2013@gmail.com

Please be informed that the application record videos by front or rear device's camera and doesn't record screen video. Record your videos silently and easy at any moment you desire from back or front camera. Simple navigation to menu and just one click to Enable over button or over menu. The application is designed for a wide range of mobile devices with the simplification of exterior styling and additional settings. Recording is activated by the user and then stop recording at any desired moment. There is possibility to define duration of recorded video. You will be able to select resolution of recorded video (please be informed that resolution depends of camera's supported features). Technical options are simplified to a minimum, but can be modified in the future at a certain number of users desires. Opportunity of using to nonrooted devices. There are no ads included in application. After installation please try to adjust the best recording quality with additional options specified in the submenu: -Select video encoder -Select video bitrate -Select the recording file format, etc. You can buy Secret Video Recording Premium version to have more advanced options to record your videos: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rasev.camera_record -no ads. -no limit of files to be recorded. Every file will be recorded separately. -save files to external storage. -support method of saving files on android version 4.4.2 and newer. -enable/disable notifications. -enable/disable camera shutter sound. -scheduling time to start and so on. -disabling/enabling vibration method while start/stop video recording by application. -hide/unhide buttons on main screen of the application. -battery level checking. -storage size checking before recording. All questions related to the operation of the application, as well as many other questions and comments can be sent to the following email   of support team: support@gofondo.com You can visit the website for frequently asked questions: www.gofondo.com Thank you for your attention!

The best looking mobile billiards game is here! 3ILLIARDS is three games in one, play 9-ball, 8-ball and snooker in single-player, multi-player or versus CPU! To enable AR the internet connection is required only the first time you launch the app. (You can also play without AR).

What is the problem that must be solved by a truly great shopping list app? Making the buying of products a snap! And that's exactly what you will get when you use the Organizy to assist you with your shopping. Use Organizy to: ⇒ Quickly add products to your list with the help of our auto-complete feature – you will be pleasantly surprised to see just how diverse and complete the Organizy's inventory is. ⇒ Strike out items from your list using only one hand – leaving the other free to take products off the shelves and put them into your shopping cart. ⇒ Save time by using the ideal route in a store to get your shopping done quickly and efficiently – Organizy automatically groups the products on your list according to sections/isles of a store. ⇒ Choose to see the "must-buy" products at the top of your list – this is especially helpful for long shopping lists. ⇒ Have no fear of accidentally striking out an item on your shopping list. You will find the Organizy intuitive and well-thought out. Once you use Organizy, you will wonder how you ever got along without it! == Support Links == http://www.facebook.com/Organizy http://plus.google.com/+Organizy http://twitter.com/Organizy support@organizy.com (formerly known as a Tote Bag grocery list app)

description: Skip long, complicated books on Phyton that get you nowhere. Do you want to start developing Phyton programs as soon as possible? Learn Phyton Programming in the quickest time possible with this short and concise app that teaches you all the essentials about Phyton programming. This book is written for people who have NO background in programming or are beginners. It strips away the non-essentials and provides you with the fundamental building blocks to get you up and running in Phyton. Phyton Programming in a Day zooms in on the most essential concepts with EXAMPLES! We cover the following topics: Introduction Hello world Who goes there Count to 10 Decisions Debugging Defining Functions Advance Functions Example List For loop boolean expression Dictionaries Modules More on Lists Revenge of the String File I/O How to handle Errors

LITTLE ALIEN, SAVE THE WORLD! For thousands of years, the ruthless Ningroms have ruled over the Zeekons. They plant numerous toxic mines to destroy the Zeekons’ defenseless Orb Towers. That way, they are unable to produce the fuel they need to launch the Zeekon saucers against this menacing horde. Only one brave but crazy little Zeekon has the courage to go against all odds… ZIXXBY! YOUR MISSION Help Zixxby rescue his home planet's moons! Only you can help his species escape from the evil clutches of the Ningrom Empire. FEATURES ♪40 challenging levels across 4 fascinating moons! ♪ Lots of alien enemies to defeat, unlock mysterious boss! ♪ Thousands of mines to destroy! Awesome explosion effects ♪ A wide variety of weapon: Sniper laser, Mini Nuke, Bouncing Bullet Gun, Comet Buster…! ♪ Challenge your different shooting skills: Pot Shot, Mini Nuke, Mine Sweep, Carnage, Skill Shot, marksman and Snake! ♪ Earn Z-bucks by completing levels to upgrade your pilot, ship and its parts! ♪ Awesome achievements system, unlock all the trophies to become the ultimate Intergalactic Fighter Pilot! ♪ Hi-tech Zoom Camera! Accelerometer-controlled movements Remember to try out the tutorial before you engage in an epic space battle! - Control Zixxby’s spacecraft by tilting the device - Shoot enemies by sliding your finger on the touchscreen - Destroy all the mines before they destroy the blue Central Orb and fight off the Ningrom army to set Zixxby’s brother clones free! NB: If the game is experiencing delays, please close down other apps that are still running. The little alien that made reviewers gush with praise! - Hidden Gem: ZIXXBY! arcade shooter game with serious eye candy - Droid Gamers - Zixxby is a new Arcade shooter from Honey Badger Studios that will WOW you with its graphics, and suck you in with its gameplay - Android Apps.com - Overall, this is a unique shooter game with lots of content and very responsive controls. The graphics are absolutely amazing. - Android App Review Source

It has the functions of video,camera,and driving route record to help you to stand up for your rights when the automobile accident is happened. It provide recurring video with 90s record for each file. Features: 1. Loop recording,just click the recording button at the bottom left of the screen to start the loop recording, don't worry about capacity issues. 2. Lock Video: During the recording process, if you want to protect some video files you recorded, just clock the lock button on the top of the screen to lock the file, and the file will not be overwritten by the loop recording. 3. Take photos, you still can take photos without logging off the application. 4. GPS driving route, in the process of video recording, the application will also record your driving route. It also supports high cloud backup function. 5. File management, it is easy to manage and view the videos, photos and the driving route. You can also lock video and upload the driving route. 6. Video space, provide four storage of 25%, 50%, 75%, & 100%. 7. Automatically upload your driving route (optional). 8. Police check feedback: When you confront a police check point, just tap the police check feedback icon on the main screen to alert other drivers, the police check location can be immediately report to the cloud server. In contrast, if other people do the same thing as mentioned above, you also can be warned in the first time. 9. Traffic jam feedback: If you are in traffic jam section, just tap the traffic jam feedback icon on the main screen to alert other drivers, the traffic jam section can be immediately report to the cloud server. In contrast, if other people do the same thing like you, you also can be warned in the first time.

description: Whether it's a hard break up, the loss of a loved one, or simply a big life change, moving on is tough and sometimes we all need a little reminder of the rainbow at the end of the storm. This wallpapers in this app feature powerful words and quotes about life, change, perseverance, happiness, letting go and more. Each beautiful wallpaper in this app features a lovely photograph or colorful background with inspirational text on top. Simply download this app and browse through the wallpapers to find the quotes and images that speak to you! You can even share these wallpapers with friends who might need a bit of inspiration to move on and enjoy life too!

リクルートが提供する中古車情報サイトcarsensor.net(かーせんさー)のアプリが登場！ 全国の中古車情報を様々な条件で検索でき、クルマの写真も充実しているので、外出先や、ちょっとした空き時間に、楽しみながら中古車探しができます！ ぜひお気に入りの1台を見つけて、中古車販売店に問合せをしてみましょう！ ■主な中古車検索機能 └ 都道府県や価格などの複数条件から中古車が検索可能！ └ オデッセイやジムニー等の中古車サイトで人気の車種名からも検索可能！ └ 軽自動車やトラックなどのクルマの形状から中古車の絞り込みが可能！ ■中古車carsensorアプリおすすめポイント 1)約30万台の中古車の画像が掲載されているので、カタログ感覚で閲覧するのもオススメ！ 2)お気に入りのクルマ登録や検索条件・閲覧履歴機能も搭載！ 3)トヨタやホンダ、日産などのメーカー系販売店も掲載！ 3)ちょっとした空き時間に中古車を探せる！ 4)アプリだから動きもスムーズ！中古車販売店への問い合わせも即可能！ 5)WEBサイト同様に中古車販売店への問い合わせ無料！ └中古自動車検索サイト【carsensor】 　PC/SP： http://goo.gl/eF58K └くるま買取・査定はコチラ 　 http://goo.gl/PwYVS └カーナビ等のカー用品通販はコチラ 　 http://goo.gl/5TlrN ■アプリと併用して最新中古車情報をチェック！ └最新の中古車情報はもちろん、新車の情報まで更新中！ 中古車カーセンサーFacebook http://goo.gl/5snRV └カーボ君が中古車情報をお届け！ 中古車カーセンサー　Twitter http://goo.gl/9j97L 『中古車【carsensor.net】であなたのクルマ選び・クルマ探しをお手伝い！』 ■中古車カーセンサーアプリ 検索上位車種例 クラウン(TOYOTA) ⇒クラウン(トヨタ)は、トヨタの最高級セダンである。官公庁などの公用車や企業の社用車、タクシー・ハイヤーとしても利用されており、トヨタ自動車を代表する車種である。 オデッセイ(honda) ⇒オデッセイ(ホンダ)は1994年に初代モデルが発売され、初代から現在までホンダの基幹車種として位置づけられている。 エスティマ（トヨタ）と共にミニバンブームの火付け役となり中古自動車市場でも人気を誇っている。 スカイライン(日産) ⇒スカイライン(日産)は日産を代表するスポーツタイプのクルマである。イチローなどをCMに起用し、北米市場を強く意識した新型スカイラインクーペの姿と重ね合わせて話題になった。 ■よくある間違い検索ワード 【中古車　CARSENCER】【ちゅうこしゃ carセンサー】【carセンサー】【かーセンサー】【カーセンサ】 中古車【carsensor.net】であなたの車選びをお手伝い！
release_text: Ver.2.9.0 いつもご利用いただきありがとうございます。 ・トップ画面に販売店検索機能追加 ・中古車一覧/中古車詳細画面にてカーセンサーアフター保証付きプランを見やすくする 変更を行いました。ぜひご利用ください！ Ver.2.8.0 お気に入り画面で、掲載終了・SOLD OUT物件がわかるようになりました。 ぜひご利用ください！ Ver.2.7.1 内部処理を改善いたしました。 アップデートにご協力いただけますと幸いです。 Ver.2.7.0 一部機能を改善いたしました。 Ver.2.6.0 在庫確認・見積依頼画面を見やすくしました。ぜひご利用ください！ Ver.2.5.0 ・中古車詳細画面に中古車販売店へお電話しやすくするためのボタン ・地域選択画面に過去選んだ地域を選ぶことができる機能 を追加いたしました。ぜひご利用ください！ ※Ver.1.2.0以前のアプリからアップデートされた場合、「履歴」画面内の「最近の検索条件」がクリアされてしまいます。 ご迷惑をおかけいたしますが、ご了承いただけますと幸いです。

description: Adventurer Jones is in serious problems!! His totems have been robbed by evil creatures and need YOUR HELP to recover them!! Join Jones along 40 levels full of traps, blockages, creatures from beyond the grave... and show what you worth!!! You’ll have the opportunity of reminding all features from nineties platform games. Extremely playable, difficulty level gradually increases with each stage taking your skills to the limit. Driving Jones is agile and simple and passing the screens is very fast. Help Jones and avoid his totems were lost forever!!
release_text: - Nuevos enemigos que harán tu partida mas divertida! - Añadidas fases nuevas, para descubrir nuevos mundos - Mejora de la jugabilidad - Corrección de errores

description: ※ご購入の際は必ず動作端末をご確認ください。 ２世紀末～３世紀の中国を題材とした物語「三国志演義」や歴史書「三国志（正史）」を題材とした、戦略級歴史シミュレーションゲームです。プレイヤーは、曹操、劉備、孫権など三国志の英雄の１人となり、他の群雄たちと領地を奪い合って天下統一を目指します。 【ゲームの特徴】 １．シンプルで奥が深いゲーム性 基本システムは「三國志」 をベースとしながら、コマンドやマップなど様々な要素を刷新。タッチ操作により数あるコマンドの直感的な使い分けを可能とし、諸葛亮のような卓越した戦略、周瑜のような鮮やかな火計、呂布のような圧倒的な突撃を、誰もがシンプルに楽しめます。 ２．ゲームを彩る個性豊かな武将たち 個々に設定された能力をもつ登場武将は全255人。ゲーム中の「列伝」で、全ての登場武将の功績や人となりを知ることができます。シナリオは全部で５本。史実シナリオのほか、新たなシナリオとして「英雄集結」を追加し、時を越えて集結した三国志の英雄たちの中国全土統一を目指した夢の競演が楽しめます。 ３．初めての方も安心の設計 チュートリアルや用語辞典、ヒント集などのサポート機能も充実しているので、初めて「三國志」シリーズに触れるユーザーでも安心してお楽しみいただけます。もちろん、Androidに最適化したスムーズなタッチ操作も実現し、快適にゲームを進めることができます。 【ゲームの進行】 自分以外の勢力すべてを滅ぼすとゲームクリア、自分の勢力が滅ぼされるとゲームオーバーになります。 戦略では、勢力ごとにターンを交代しながらゲームを進めます。ターンは１ヶ月ごとに各領地に回ってきます。 戦闘では、部隊ごとにターンを交代しながらゲームを進めます。ターンは１日ごとに各領地に回ってきます。一回の戦闘は３０日で構成されています。 ※本商品はmyGAMECITYマーケットで購入できる商品と同内容のものです。購入の際にはご留意ください。 ■対応機種 NTT docmo/au/SoftBank アンドロイド携帯（OS：Android 2.2～4.0以上） ※Android OS 3.0端末/一部端末は除く ※動作確認済み端末以外の動作保証は致しておりません。 　必ず動作確認済み端末をご確認の上、ご購入ください。 ----- ●動作確認端末 【docomo】 Garaxy S（SC-02B）、Garaxy Tab（SC-01C）、GALAXY S2（SC-02C）、MEDIAS WP（N-06C）、Xperia arc（SO-01C）、XPERIA ACRO（SO-02C）、OPTIMUS BRIGHT（L-07C）、AQUOS PHONE（SH-12C) 【au】 IS05（IS05）、htc EVO WiMAX（ISW11HT）、AQUOS PHONE（IS11SH） 【SoftBank】 GALAPAGOS（005SH）、AQUOS PHONE THE HYBRID（007SH） ※動作確認済み端末以外の動作保証は致しておりません御了承ください。 　お客様にはご迷惑をおかけいたしますが､なにとぞご理解いただきますようお願い申し上げます。 ©コーエーテクモゲームス All rights reserved. ※ Please check the operating terminal at the time of purchase. description: ►► ORIGINAL, MULTILINGUAL STORIES IN ENGLISH, FRENCH, GERMAN, SPANISH, RUSSIAN, AND UKRAINIAN! ◄◄ Hello! My name is Moka. I am a cuddly toy and I love telling stories. I love to write stories with simple words, that everybody can understand. And with lots of pictures! Because I love to draw. Fear not! My stories are not scary, but lots of fun and full of adventure. If you are between 2 and 10 years, my stories are for you! Today I am going to tell you the story of the Donkey and the Pixies. But don't be afraid! You see, it's a story that ends well. The first half of this story is free. If you like it, unlocking the full story only costs $0,99. ► ABOUT MOKA'S STORIES AND FAIRY TALES FOR CHILDREN: Moka's stories for kids are written with simple words and colorful illustrations. Users have the choice of reading the story themselves, or hearing it read by a captivating narrator. This exciting story is brought to life with music, sound effects, and much more! ► FEATURES: Original stories for children Multilingual: English, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Ukrainian Narration ON/OFF Great illustrations Background music Do you have enough of always the same stories like Cinderella, The Sleeping Beauty, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, Rapunzel, Tom Thumb, Three little pigs, Little Thumbling, Little Red Riding Hood, Hansel and Gretel, William Tell...?? Try Moka's stories and fairy tales for children!

description: Classic Red Skin for GoneMAD Music Player 1.6.7

Find Hidden Objects in deliciously addictive Candy World Hidden Object! **No in-app purchases** Look for objects in 28 decadent Hidden Object scenes in this FREE Hidden Object game. Candy World contains artfully hidden items surrounded by sweet treats. Enjoy exceptional HD graphics with a zoom feature for those hard to find items. If you are searching for the best Hidden Object game, look no further! Look for candy and other items in a candy wonderland with Lollipops, Gingerbreads, Candy Canes and more! Three different modes of play: NORMAL Mode - Timed, limited hints and exciting bonus rounds. CASUAL Mode - A nice and relaxing experience. CHALLENGE Mode - An extra challenge for those willing to accept it! Four ways to find items: Find by PICTURE - discover the items with a list of pictures. Find by SILHOUETTE - find the items using only their silhouettes. Find by WORD - a list of words is what you get to find each item in the scene. Find by RANDOM - A random selection of the above modes for an extra challenge! Remember to brush your teeth after playing! *Dolby Audio on supported devices*

Девушку по имени Арина предал парень Саша и лучшая подруга Кристина, казалось это конец, но судьба дарит ей второй шанс на жизнь. Новая жизнь совсем не похожа на предыдущую, здесь все по другому, даже младший братик Саши Влад уже не двухлетний ребенок, а взрослый парень от которого почему-то учащается пульс... description: Antutu benchmark is the most popular Android smartphone and tablet benchmarking app in the world!. ☆ Over 100,000,000 users ☆ No.1 benchmark app,used as an industry standard by most of leading technology companies and hardware review sites. Through click and go test suite, Antutu benchmark measures User Experience, CPU, RAM, 2D/3D graphics, GPU, I/O performance of Android smartphone or tablet. You will get accurate device performance score report. The score will update to the Antutu benchmark database and get your device ranking, which you can share and compare it with other Android devices. Benchmark Matrix: ☆ User Experience (UX) - Direct impression on smart device performance with detailed scores. ☆ CPU Tests - Measures how powerful of CPU , with detailed score points and true hard numbers. ☆ RAM Tests - Real processing ability the RAM. ☆ GPU Tests - Real graphics processing performance, 3D effects, games, and video play performance. ☆ I/O Tests –A direct score that reflects on the factual input/output (I/O) performance your system permits. Get your device Antutu benchmark score and ranking! Compare and share it with your friends! NOTE: The Antutu benchmark score of your device is decided by your hardware configuration, also affected by many elements, including system mode, device temperature and running apps and other elements. It may not be the same score every time you test. Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/antutulabs Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/antutulabs For any suggestion or feedback, we expect your great ideas via email : support@antutu.com

description: Angry & Crazy Hungry Fish 3D This is a role playing game where you have to play the role of a fish. This is not a fishing game. At the beginning of each chapter, you are a small fish. The hero fish starts fishing (eating small fish and grow up). You are a small fish, you are in a pond. You can only eat fish smaller than you. As you eat fish, you get bigger and can eat bigger fish and get angry. But if bigger fishes gets angry and catch you, they will eat you up. So you have to be safe from there and try to survive longer. Tap anywhere on the screen. Your fish will follow the tap and move to the tap location. While moving towards the tap position, if the fish finds any fish that is smaller, the fish will eat that small fish. So enjoy the coolest arcade game ever "Angry Hungry Fish", start fishing by a fish, eat fish ant grow up by fishing. Dont make bigger fishes angry :D Stay tuned with us to enjoy more cool fishing and puzzle games. You can also play the iOS version if you have any iOS device https://itunes.apple.com/app/id727802357 The game is also available in amazon store for amazon devices like kindle http://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/dl/android?p=air.couk.hamzagames.angryhungryfish3d Please join us at Facebook https://www.facebook.com/HamzaGames Visit our website & stay tuned with us http://www.hamzagames.com/ http://www.hamzagamesonline.com

"I love this app!!!!" "Unique effects. - Surprising amounts of app depth." "This is crap, throw away my money!!!!!!" "...truly a hidden treasure." "Absolutely awesome, will use this a lot!" "Unglaublich, was diese App kann! Einfach zu bedienen, sehr umfangreich und heraus kommen wahre Kunstwerke. Toll! " "Wow! - Didn't expected so much from an iPhone drawing app." PhotoViva is a powerful application for photo editing and freeform painting. It can help you transform your pictures into expressive and colorful works of art. In addition to tools for enhancing your photos, there are paint brushes that let you make abstract painted interpretations of photos. You can select a brush and copy image features by cloning or painting. Brushes can track the direction of movement, or you can set the brush direction. You can also change the hue, saturation and blur of brush strokes as you go. App Hints •Use the "Enlighten" tool on images that have people in the shadows • Use large brush strokes to fill the canvas, then use smaller brush strokes to reveal detail • Use Brushes in "Copy" mode instead of "Paint" mode to copy the source image to the canvas • Use Tools->Blend undo.. to vary the density of your most recent change to the canvas • Use the Airbrush in "Copy" mode to blend the image directly to the canvas after painting with brush strokes • Try clearing to White, Black or Cream using the Fill menu before painting • Add color noise to brush strokes to make a lively variation in the color • Use less or no color noise when painting on skin tones • Use the HDR correction feature on images that have people in the shadows Note The maximum output image size is based on the CPU and graphics capabilities of your iOS device. Featured Functionality • "Enlightenment" for high contrast photos • Zoom and pan your canvas to do detailed work • Image cropping • 10 levels of undo and redo • Camera support for devices with cameras • Gallery of sample images provided Terrific Tools • High Dynamic Range (HDR) correction • RGB adjustment • Shadows, midtones, and brightness control • Saturation and Sharpening • Autopaint mode • Hue adjustment • Add noise function • Blend functions • Fill to white, black or cream • Fill frame, outline or center • Fill to current color • Liquify your image Brilliant Brushes • 20 brushes are provided • Set the angle or let the brushes track your touch • Brushes paint or copy • Brush size and color can be varied Color Creativity • Edit colors or pick colors from the canvas • An image can be used as a source of color • Adjust brightness, blur, saturation and hue on the fly • Current canvas can be used as a source of image color • Noise can be added to the color to vary the paint strokes

SeaMap shows nautical information on a map. This includes beacons, buoys and other navigation aids. This information is obtained from OpenSeaMap which is part of the OpenStreetMap project. description: NOTE: Half-Life 2 for Android requires a controller to play and runs exclusively on NVIDIA SHIELD portable and SHIELD tablet. For more information on SHIELD, please check out http://shield.nvidia.com As featured in TegraZone and with over 50 Game of the Year Awards and a the highest MetaCritic score of any PC game, Half-Life 2 is one of the most celebrated and best selling games of all time. Winner of multiple Game of the Decade Awards, Half-Life 2 offers a startling level of realism and responsiveness, opening the door to a world where the player’s presence affects everything around him, from the physical environments to the behaviors – even the emotions – of both friends and enemies. The player again picks up the crowbar of research scientist Gordon Freeman, who finds himself on an alien-infested Earth being picked to the bone, its resources depleted, its populace dwindling. • Digital Actors: Experience the most sophisticated in-game characters ever witnessed. • Advanced AI: Friends and foes assess threats and fashion weapons from what is at hand. • Stunning Graphics: Incredibly realistic environments and special effects. • Physical Gameplay: Objects obey the laws of gravity, friction, and buoyancy. Play it on NVIDIA SHIELD.

description: Play "Four In A Line" online with players all over the world or play offline with machine AI. "Four in a Line" is a two-player game in which the players first choose a color and then take turns dropping their colored discs from the top into vertically-suspended grid. The pieces fall straight down, occupying the next available space within the column. The object of the game is to connect four of one's own discs of the same color next to each other vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before one's opponent can do so. There are two variations on the board size, the most commonly used being 7x6, the other being 9x7. It has a strong AI engine when play offline, there are 7 difficulty levels in total. In online play mode ELO rating system is used to calculate the relative skill levels of players.

description: Billiards is a realistic and easy-to-play billiards simulation game. It includes five different billiard games: 9-Ball, 8-Ball, Straight, 3-Balls or Snooker. The game is fully 3D-animated, allowing the billiards player full control of the view angle of the table and the cue-stick by rotating and zooming in or out with intuitive touch gestures. The billiard balls rotate over the table felt and collide with each other with outstanding real-life physics simulation. The game includes tons of options. You can select your favorite billiards game 9-Ball, 8-Ball, Straight, 3-Balls or Snooker. You can practice solo or pick a match against a computer opponent. You can have a match with another player on your device or you can challenge online users around the world. Main features: • Five billiard games included: 9-Ball, 8-Ball, Straight, 3-Balls and Snooker. • Five gorgeous table styles and five cloth colors • Smooth 3D table zoom and rotation by touch gestures • Intuitive touch interface allows you to control cue direction and shot strength • Advanced control of the ball's impact spot allows for english, follow, drag and masse shooting techniques • You can play any game in practice mode or you can play a match • Matches can be played against a computer opponent or with another opponent taking turns on one device • You can also challenge opponents that are connected online around the world and chat with them while you play • The game includes sound effects, background music and a voice narrator

Offers instant weather information for boaters on Lake Michigan including wave height, wind speed, temperature and more. Also shows Marine Radio Channel 1 data for Chicago / Southern Lake Michigan in Plain Text for fast load. Radar & Cloud Maps on tabs plus location if you're lost on the Lake under HELP! tab. This is a simple app I created for myself to use at Hammond Marina but I decided to share it for anybody who wants to use it. It tells you instantly what's important before you go out. Data for entire Lake Michigan and local Chicago area current conditions information for Wilmette Harbor, Northerly Island and Calumet Harbor. Also includes U.S. Coast Guard contact info for emergency needs with a 'Show Me Where I Am Right Now' button.
release_text: + Weather Radar Image (updates every 10 minutes) + Satellite Image (updates every 15 minutes) + Approximate Location Data (emergencies or if you're lost) + Wave Height + Wind Speed + Air Temperature + Water Temperature + Wind Gusts + Chicago Area Current Conditions

You can preview, play with zoom, change the flash mode and see how the final result will look like with your favorite filter. Save time and get the perfect look ready to share. Tight integration with the KVAD apps family makes it easy to polish the photo in Photo Studio app for the greatest results. Main features: - Real-time professional filters – take photos with chosen filters already applied - Get 25+ free various filters. Even more filters are available for in-app purchase - Front and back cameras support for group images, sunsets, selfies or anything else - Touch exposure - Configure filter levels and fine tune filters for the best results - Save photos in high quality for the further processing - Flash modes support - auto, off, on - Zoom in/zoom out support for camera preview - Geo-tagging support - Timer support - Displaying date on photos - Integration with Photo Studio for additional photo enhancement - Share photos on Facebook, Twitter and other available apps, or Save to the Gallery Join us on Facebook at facebook.com/KVADGroup Follow us on Twitter to learn about new content and updates @KvadGroup.

description: A fun application for toddlers to learn to recognize vehicles and their sounds. "Vehicles for Toddlers" is an educational and entertaining game. Two apps in one: - Your child will admire every kind of vehicle and will hear realistic sound effects! - it's a Coloring Book : your baby will have lots of fun coloring the drawings of cars, motorcycles, trucks! A lot of different drawings! Real vehicles sounds and real images to keep your kid busy. Easy to learn and to control: change the image tapping the arrow, tap to listen the sound, choose the color to use from the left palette, choose the eraser to remove the colors, change the brush size. Available for all screen resolutions and devices, including tablet device! Simple and intuitive! Vehicles for Toddlers is a nice game for toddlers and kids from ages 0-10. Features include: - Easy to learn and control - Browse the vehicles gallery - More than 190 images of vehicles: truck, tractor, excavator, bus, fire truck, train, sailboat, motorcycle, airplane, boat, motorboat, police car, race car, ships, helicopter and ambulance. (FULL version) - Tap the image for a realistic sound effect - Coloring the drawing with the finger - Choose the color from the palette - The Eraser to remove the colors - Choose the brush size - More than 60 drawings in the FULL version - Save the best drawings to SD and share them! This is the FREE version (Ads supported), If your kid likes this app, then you can buy the FULL version with more drawings/vehicles and NO ads https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.romesoft.toddlers.carsFull or you can unlock the full version in-app Fun and enjoyable to learn to know the vehicles, this is a must have app! An educational game for toddlers and young kids!!

MasterCard Nearby™ is a next generation mobile app from MasterCard. Building on the features of the ATM Hunter and PayPass Locator, Nearby offers additional services and improved functionality. Whether you’re looking for a place to use your contactless device, reload your prepaid card, get cash back with your purchase, or use an ATM - MasterCard Nearby can help. • Locate two million ATMs worldwide with 30 street level and 210 city level countries and territories with our ATM Locator functionality. • Find contactless acceptance locations worldwide where you can make everyday purchases quickly and safely with just a tap of your contactless-enabled MasterCard® or Maestro® card or device. • Seek out cash back at participating U.S. merchant locations when you make a purchase using your debit or prepaid card. • Search for over 100,000 participating merchants in the U.S. where you can add money to your eligible MasterCard® or Maestro® prepaid card using the MasterCard® rePowerTM network. Even when you’re far from home, MasterCard is always nearby.

description: Memorize the Multiplication tables from 1 to 12! Improve your multiplication skills and try to get a perfect score! Multiplication Tables will no longer be boring! Game ideal for primary / elementary school. Overview: • cool, simple and colorful graphics; • all times tables up to 12; • endless opportunities to practice the times tables (questions generated randomly) • free educational game; Multiplication is an important subject for success in elementary school. Math games for kids can help take the frustration out of learning multiplication with games, flash cards, worksheets, and activities. Our game make learning multiplication facts more fun than frustrating for young learners. It is essential for elementary school and middle school to have a solid math foundation, so why shouldn’t they play cool multiplication games and learn at the same time? Times table is a free, carefully designed game, which uses a child-friendly interface with easy navigation making it suitable for independent play. It helps to learn multiplication tables in an effective and fun way. It challenges Kids to keep practicing and do this math exercises. Easy to use – just slide the screen to choose the correct answer. If you select the correct one- the application automatically changes the card to the next question. If you choose wrong, before the next question will be indicated the correct answer. Game modes: • PLAY - answer chosen number of questions in the time limit. Kids will get new questions each time they play the game. The app stores scores, so parents could keep track of their children's progress. Kids love to play and afterwards see their progress in the overview. • LEARN - allows you to choose which times tables you wish to practice. Learn all multplication tables by heart in time / no time. Ideal to prepare for the test at school. • SCORE - quickly and easily review all the scores. • OPTIONS - allows you to choose time limit and number of questions. If you have any children in school who are not doing well in math class, no matter what the level or grade they are in. This game apply to them and their friends! Having problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/TimesTablesGame Sounds provided by http://www.freesfx.co.uk
